To those who played the original game, Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch, both the house and the Conductor will be familiar. The Conductor’s role in this story, however, remains to be discovered!

name: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors
summary: The game is a murder mystery visual novel with a heavy story focus that requires multiple playthroughs to figure out and involves puzzle rooms used to progress through the story with dialogue choices to be made inbetween them.

name: Nighthawks
summary:
"Nighthawks is the brand new urban fantasy RPG from Wadjet Eye Games (The Blackwell Legacy, Unavowed, Technobabylon) and writer/designer Richard Cobbett (Sunless Sea/Sunless Skies, The Long Journey Home)."

"Nighthawks is a mix of story-driven RPG and undead life-simulation, where every decision you make is another move in your chess game against the world. Invest your time into learning new skills or honing your fighting style as you uncover the city's mysteries and venture deep into its darkest secrets. Gather fellow outcasts to your side, binding them with favours and choosing when to cash in. Manage your eternal thirst, legitimately, or balancing the risks of being caught stalking unwary victims and working the black markets."

name: Nilia
summary:
Select your character and explore all the levels.

From dungeons to mines a passage through hell to freezing ice mountains, you will face lots of dangers to reach the final fortress.

Don't forget to collect the more gems you can!
Use them to level up your character and learn spells.

name: Ninja from Hell vs. Reptiloids
summary:
Ninja from Hell vs. Reptiloids - a classic clicker. In which you need to appease the ancient deity to save the world from destruction.
You act as a master of the ninja, who, for the sake of the deity, chops the unfaithful heretics. Collect points, move on, only so, you will save the world from destruction!

name: Nice to NO you
summary: Delete the memories of humans in "Nice to NO you" - a dystopian dialogue game where you decide the fate of individuals and the world.

name: Nia: Jewel Hunter
summary: Immerse yourself in an atmospheric world where a young girl named Nia is transported to an ancient realm. Solve puzzles, avoid dangers, collect artifacts, and activate portals to bring Nia back to the modern world. The challenges and mysteries of ancient civilizations await you!

name: Night at the Harbor
summary:
Night at the Harbor is a short, ultra-retro, psychological horror/horror game about a fisherman who lost his phone.

Synopsis:
After a long day of fishing, Hopper returns to the harbor to dock his boat and head on home. He gets back to his truck and realizes he left his phone on the boat, his decision to go back and get it might be the last choice he ever makes.

name: Nino Maze Lofi II
summary: Following Nino Maze Lofi line of cute graphics and Lofi music, we now bring Nino Maze Lofi II, a new adventure.

name: Nibansen
summary: If something unusual happens, return to the opposite passage! A mysterious respect-based escape game from the subway station to the exit "Line 2 | Nibansen"

name: Nightfall Comes
summary: Nightfall Comes is a 3D top-view action game with rogue-lite, story of the four protagonists who gathered to the castle of certain land, led by their last lingering feelings in the extinct world.

name: Ninja Party
summary: Ninja Party is a free parkour action game from the creators of Shadow Fight and Vector. Compete with other players in fun challenges for the title of the best ninja!

name: Ninja Cats: Tactics
summary: Build the ultimate ninja squad with your voice! NINJA CATS: Tactics is a battle RPG where communicating with your ninja cats builds trust. Train and nurture them through voice commands, shaping their skills and abilities. Enjoy chatting with them or streaming your adventure—it's up to you!

name: Nightgate
summary: In the year 2398, a network of intelligent computers known as Nightgate, is the last remaining life form on Earth.

name: Night of the Blood Moon
summary: Use the darkness of a blood moon to rise from the nightmares and take back the dream realm! Use unique weapons, grow your power, and destroy the charming creatures of the dream realm. Develop your skills with, unlock pets, and defeat bosses who will challenge your strategy along side your skill.

name: Nightmare Hunter
summary: Nightmare Hunter is an arcade game where you have to defeat the coming nightmares.

name: Nightmares Mansion: Scary Dreams
summary: Explore a scary mansion in the first-person adventure horror game. Talk to kidnapped souls, collect grimoires, and discover the hidden secret inside the many doors. Your soul was stolen, and you found yourself in the underworld. Can you escape?

name: Nioh: Complete Edition
summary:
Steel your mind and ready your blade for an intense action RPG experience set in bloody Sengoku era Japan. Combining real life historical events with dark fantasy and folklore, face off against bloodthirsty warlords and otherworldly demons – using an arsenal of weaponry, magic, and ninjutsu to defy death.

In this edition of Nioh, discover William’s complete journey along the path of the samurai with three huge add-ons, including:
- Dragon of the North
- Defiant Honor
- Bloodshed’s End

Equip yourself for the adventure with five powerful Nioh weapons, the Nioh Armor set, and three all-new pieces of headgear; the Visitor’s Dragon Kabuto, the Good Fox Kabuto and the Lucky Tanuki Kabuto. Additionally, enjoy wearing the Dharmachakra Kabuto as a Steam exclusive bonus.

name: Night Shift Nurses
summary: A washed-up mad doctor is hired back by a devious former test subject and asked to twist her hospital into a corrupt donation mill. Will he seize this second chance to practice his own vision of "science," or will his many failings drag him down once again in this pseudo-medical visual novel?

name: Nihon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Honkaku Pro Mahjong: Shin Tetsuman
summary: Nippon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Shin Tetsuman is a Mahjong board game, developed by Chat Noir and published by Naxat Soft, which was released in Japan in 1998.

name: Nitroplus Blasterz: Heroines Infinite Duel
summary: Nitroplus Blasterz: Heroines Infinite Duel is a fighting game which crosses over heroines from various visual novels and games released by Nitroplus, as well as those from manga and anime series that Nitroplus writers have been involved with. The game uses five buttons; light attack, medium attack, heavy attack, escape action, and heavy action. The escape action button can be used to perform evasive maneuvers and guards while heavy actions can be used to push an opponent back. Players can perform Infinite Blasts, which can interrupt an opponent's attack, Variable Rushes, which allows for surprise combos, and Lethal Blazes, which serve as the game's super combo attacks. Players can also choose two support characters which they can summon to assist them.

name: Nick Bounty: The Dame with the Blue Chewed Shoe.
summary: A comedic film noir adventure. You play the down on his luck detective as he tries to discover who murdered the woman found naked in a local playground sandbox.

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle
summary: Fight for justice in Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, an anime-themed graphic adventure game! This was the original chapter release of Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, which has now been superceded in the collected release, Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One.

name: Ninja: Shadow of Darkness
summary:
Ninja is a fast-paced, arcade style action-adventure. The game features highly detailed environments, a wide range of special effects and huge end-of-level bosses.

Assuming the role of the young ninja Kurosawa, you must guide him through a series of progressively difficult environments. The Ninja is able to collect magic potions, scrolls, extra lives, energy and weapons throughout the levels to help him on his quest.

name: Night of Full Moon: Wolf - Mirror
summary: Set before Diary of Little Red Riding Hood, Black Swan stumbles upon a magical mirror and is sucked into the Mirror World. On her way to escape from the Mirror World, Black Swan discovers that she is not the only one trapped and with the help of her friends, she begins to search for her memories...

name: Nin Online
summary: Fight and train with powerful Jutsu to rise through the ranks of your hidden village in a ninja open-world MMORPG. Nin Online combines roleplaying systems with intense real-time combat. Warning: This is a very hardcore RPG!

name: Night of the Wendigo
summary: Night of the Wendigo is a Virtual Reality horror experience in which a peaceful day of hiking becomes a night of survival! The game is a very simple VR experience that is best enjoyed by taking turns with friends.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl: Jenny
summary: Buy the Jenny Pack to unlock the state-of-the-art protagonist from My Life as a Teenage Robot. Available Now. Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl game required; sold separately.

name: Night Shippers
summary: You signed up to deliver food in the underworld, alone or with up to 4 friends. Take orders, dodge monsters, and survive the night - or be trapped in hell forever.

name: Niji Protocol
summary: Hunt the Demon Aristocracy in this neon-noir detective puzzle game. As an agent of the Njij Protocol, travel the globe, interview witnesses, and cross-reference clues in the Grimoire to profile the suspect before time runs out and history is lost forever.

name: Nijikoi no Houkakou
summary: Meet with the story of high school in 3 years that you can determine your life. Enjoying along with events and activities so the daily won’t be boring and comes up with a new feeling like never felt before. What are you waiting for? Let’s join us now at Hoshisora high school!

name: Nilspace
summary: An all new Strategy RPG inspired by your favorites! Develop a guild, foster character relationships, and customize your units for battle. Discover the unknown realities of Nilspace and its many stories.

name: Nightmare Pick
summary: Nightmare Pick is a simple mining combat game where you upgrade your equipment with ores to defeat monsters blocking your path and find a way to escape the nightmare.

name: NITE Team 4
summary: NITE Team 4 is a hacking simulation and strategy game with Alternate Reality Game elements connected to The Black Watchmen universe. You play as a new recruit in the sophisticated hacking cell, Network Intelligence & Technical Evaluation (NITE) Team 4. Engaged in cyberwarfare with black hat groups and hostile states, you will be in a struggle to penetrate highly secure targets. Your job is to use the STINGER hacking platform to infiltrate hardened computer networks and coordinate strike teams on the ground to carry out missions that feature real espionage tradecraft terminology taken from leaked NSA documents.

name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom - Premium Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Premium Edition Packaging
- Steelbook Case
- Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom Game Software
- 3D Papercraft Kit
- Music CD Collection
- Special Swords Set Day 1 DLC + Exclusive Dragon's Tooth Weapon DLC

name: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2
summary: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 is the “ultimate” Ninja Gaiden, featuring characters from the previous installments that have defined the franchise. It radiates a striking visual appeal in high resolution display, featuring character and environmental graphics whose quality exceeds the original Ninja Gaiden Sigma. Combining both melee and long-range battles against enemies, the game requires skillful and strategic playing to successfully journey through the missions.

name: Nine Worlds
summary: This is a ARPG game, at the same time contains some roguelike elements, players will freely choose to control a body, fight them in the world of monsters, in the world to find the artifact that can help you, defeat the island controller, and finally find the entrance to the next world.

name: Nine Parchments
summary:
Nine Parchments is a co-operative blast'em up game of magic mayhem from Frozenbyte! 
 
Runaway apprentice wizards seize the opportunity to complete their spellbooks by going after the lost Nine Parchments. 
 
As the would-be wizards rapidly acquire powerful new spells without learning proper safety measures, it's natural their hasty progress results in plenty of deadly accidents... 
 
Nine Parchments combines real-time spell-shooting action with RPG elements - level up your character and collect magical loot, filling your wardrobe with a myriad of wizard hats and powerful staves.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl
summary:
The largest collection of Nickelodeon characters ever assembled in a fighting game!
Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl brings together your favorite Nickelodeon characters for one bombastic battle. With a power-packed cast of heroes from the top shows within the Nickelodeon universe, face-off with all-stars from SpongeBob Squarepants, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, The Loud House, Aaahh!!!, Real Monsters, Avatar, The Wild Thornberrys, Hey Arnold!, Rugrats, and many more to determine ultimate dominance. With unique move sets and attacks drawn directly from their identifiable personalities, each character has its own style of play enabling endless hours of enjoyable action for Nickelodeon's legion of fans.

name: Ninja Gaiden
summary: Ninja Action! The stage is set for conspiracy, mystery and evil in America. Come with Ninja Ryu as he takes you on his fateful journey. Tecmo's unique cinema display system develops the story stage by stage. You piece together the puzzle, while watching the movie-like graphics. Decide what action to take. Use the secret sword and items collected during the action scenes to fight your way to the goal!

name: Ninja Must Die
summary: "Ninja Must Die" combines horizontal parkour game horizontal action game. It has carried out a subversive innovation and defined a new game type of "action combat parkour RPG".Beautiful ink painting style, hearty battle duel, brings players a unique cool experience on mobile devices.

name: Ninja Revenger
summary: Arcade-style top-down 2D action game. Sacrifice energy as you defeat foes and carve your path forward. As you take risks, adrenaline surges, unleashing Berserk. Keep fighting for revenge as the Cyber Ninja.

name: Nimbus
summary: Utilize our highly detailed flight system to control your gas expenditure, flap openings, and more :)

name: Nira
summary: Nira is a fast-paced survival exploration game. Explore endless procedurally generated worlds to gather resources you need to survive. But when night falls, creatures arise. Build a base, craft weapons and tame wild animals to fight hordes of goblins. Explore, Build, Fight, Survive, and find Nira.

name: Nitro Kid
summary: Synthwave roguelike deckbuilder set in the neon 80's. Pick your agent. Build your deck. Hit card combos and fight through the floors of INFINITY tower. Featuring 30+ Synthwave tracks composed exclusively for the game.

name: Nightmare Halls
summary: A psychological horror game where you work through puzzles and walk through the halls of a mansion you are stuck in.

name: Night Shift at the Museum
summary: Watch the cameras. Catch the anomalies. Report every irregularity. Repair the malfunctioning systems. While trying to meet your hourly reporting quota, various incidents may force you to move around the museum. When your reflection starts moving on its own, it's no longer just another night shift.

name: Ninja Chowdown: Glaze of Glory
summary: Play as Donatsu, the chubby ninja and use your secret arts to fight along 35 action packed levels, in which to collect donuts and defeat members of the evil food clans. Ninja Chowdown: Glaze of Glory is a delicious pixel art arcade that will put your abilities to test.

name: Nier: Automata - Game of the Yorha Edition
summary:
NieR:Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 and their battle to reclaim the machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful machines.

The NieR:Automata Game of the YoRHa Edition includes the game itself and comes packed with DLC and bonus content for the full experience of the award-winning post-apocalyptic action RPG, including:
- 3C3C1D119440927 DLC*
- Cardboard Pod Skin
- Retro Grey Pod Skin
- Retro Red Pod Skin
- Grimoire Weiss Pod
- Machine Mask Accessory
- (PC Version) Valve Character Accessory, Exclusive set of wallpapers in the following sizes: 1024 x 768, 1280 x 1024, 1920 x 1080, 2560 x 1600
- (PS4 Version) Play System Pod Skin, the amazarashi Head Pod Skin, a Dynamic Theme and 15 PSN avatars.

name: Nichijou: Uchuujin
summary: Nichijou: Uchuujin is a visual novel based on the manga series Nichijou, where the player takes the role of a producer from "Galaxy TV" running the television series Nichijou, whose objective is to keep the ratings high by correctly deciding on what unusual situation to insert in the show.

name: Nitro Karts Racing
summary: Kart fast, play hard

name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom
summary:
The sequel to Ni no Kuni being developed for Windows and PlayStation 4.
Players control Evan Pettiwhisker Tildrum, a young king who was usurped from his castle and sets out to reclaim his kingdom. While players can freely navigate Evan throughout the game's open world, other characters can be controlled during battles against enemies. During these battles, players use magical abilities and elemental creatures known as "Higgledies", which are used to cast spells.

name: Night of the Dead Simulator
summary:
Grab a weapon and follow us - doomsday is here, and time is running out!

The end of the human race is near. The zombie attack threatens our future, but there is hope. You, a soldier from the DELTA team, hold the cure in your hands. Will you be the one to save the world?

Use your weapons, search for and keep track of your ammo, and reach your objective several kilometers to the east. Hurry up and get a move on—time waits for no one.

Does anyone know how to dispatch a zombie? Face hordes of hundreds of zombies in an immersive bodycam experience.

Have some fun while you’re at it. Zombies are clumsy, and you're an expert in destruction, but don't forget that the end of the world is lurking around the corner. Make the most of what you’ve got around you!

name: Night Blood: Avenger's Tide
summary: "Night Blood: Avenger's Tide" is a side-scrolling action game that takes place in the world's most prosperous city, Atlandi. Players need to control Mark to find his own past, break through the enemy's siege, and finally uncover the huge conspiracy hidden behind the crisis.

name: Nightfall Warriors
summary:
Nightfall Warriors is a co-op oriented game (but solo mode is also available), where you fight supernatural monsters with your companion.

The uniqueness of it is that you don't need two headsets to play Duo, only one, and a phone/tablet. This can involve your backseat player friends, family, or channel viewers.

You'll have a bunch of weapons, tools and abilities on your journey. Your companion can aid you by exploring the map, getting all the loot, giving you tools and usings their abilities.

Play with your friends or familliy, or anyone in the world to hunt down evil.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Duke it out with the biggest and best fighting character roster yet! This Ultimate edition contains the following content:
• Full Base Game
• Season Pass Content
- 4 additional brawlers
- Bonus SpongeBob Squarepants "The Quickster" Costume
• A bonus costume for every brawler!

name: Nightshade
summary: A romance visual novel game made in collaboration with D3P and Red Entertainment.Character design and illustrations are by the popular illustrator Teita. The romance revolves around Ninjas who have lived through the Sengoku Period.

name: Nidus
summary: Emerge into Nidus as a mind-bending Symbiotic Duo. Control Two Characters Simultaneously in challenging Twin-Stick Top-Down Arena gameplay. Gather power, devour the swarm, and shine brilliantly as your strive to complete the mesmerizing collective lifecycle.

name: Nice Day for Fishing
summary: The world needs you Adventurer! Embark on an RPG pixel adventure where you’ll play as Baelin the humble fisherman, who must rise-up to become the hero of Honeywood. Battle fish with precision timing and magic spells, upgrade your abilities, defeat evil and rebuild Honeywood.

name: Ninja vs. Zombies 3
summary: Fight Zombies, Monsters and a Nightmare with your Skills and Upgrades, use your Sword correctly and escape with Smoke Bombs, blast your way or smash Undead side by side with your Ninja Elite like never before. Action-packed meets Survival RogueElite Ninja Game.

name: Nightwatch
summary: Nightwatch is a first person mystery game that plays out in the woods of Rivertidecreek. A walking simulator that features choices of dialogues and different puzzles. The artwork will make you feel absorbed in the game.

name: Night Warriors: Darkstalkers' Revenge
summary: The Darkstalkers return and now crave the fury of a good night fight. In this head-to-head fighting challenge, creatures from your darkest nightmares battle for eternal control fo the night. Treacherous, classic favorites take on 4 new challengers for total domination. Donovan, the Dark Hunter. Huitzil, the Killer Machine. Hsien-Ko, the Chinese Ghost. And Pyron, the ultimate Alien ruler. The battle has never been as intense, with faster speeds, more captivating moves and even more incredible graphics. Night Warriors; the game of your dreams, and nightmares.

name: Night to Meet Chu!
summary: An ASMR-enhanced visual novel game starring VTuber NightMare herself! What is the secret hidden your encounter and her inability to find eternal peace?

name: Ninety-Six
summary: A remade version of 96, with optimized performance, reworked maps and brand-new features. This version also contains the bonus episode Another Story and a secret folder to unlock at the end of the game.

name: Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway
summary: Rebuilt and re-imagined from the ground up, Nickelodeon Kart Racers returns - bigger and better than ever! Featuring a fully voice-acted cast of over 40 iconic characters, drift, slide, and boost your way to the finish line on tracks inspired by legendary Nickelodeon shows like SpongeBob SquarePants, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Avatar: The Last Airbender, and more!

name: Night Book
summary: Night Book is an interactive occult thriller about an online interpreter who is tricked into reading an ancient book that summons a demon into her home. Loralyn works the night shift remotely from her home, live interpreting video calls from English to French and back again. Currently pregnant, with a husband working far away and caring for her mentally ill father, she is desperately trying to keep her family together and safe – but who is she prepared to sacrifice to survive? The fiancé, the baby, her father or herself?

name: Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition
summary:
Test your speedrunning skills across more than 150 challenging moments from 13 classic NES games! Compete against players around the world online, challenge your friends on the couch, or try to see how far you can push your personal bests.

Do you have what it takes to be a champion? The tougher challenges may truly test your limits!

name: Nights Into Dreams...
summary: The story follows the teenagers Elliot Edwards and Claris Sinclair, who enter Nightopia, a dream world where all dreams take place. With the help of Nights, an exiled "Nightmaren", they begin a journey to stop the evil ruler Wizeman from destroying Nightopia and consequently the real world. Players control Nights flying through Elliot and Claris's dreams to gather enough energy to defeat Wizeman and save Nightopia. The game is presented in 3D and imposes time limits on every level, in which the player must accumulate points to proceed.

name: Nights Into Dreams
summary: This version of Nights Into Dreams is a port of the Saturn version with identical gameplay, but also incorporates the levels included in Christmas Nights into Dreams as a bonus. It also contains the feature from that version where the characters wearing special seasonal clothing during certain holidays. The game offers two graphics modes: a remake mode with updated graphics and a classic SEGA Saturn graphics mode.

name: Ninja Gaiden 3: Razor's Edge

The game can be considered an equivalent to the Ninja Gaiden Sigma games, as it enhances the original title.

name: Nikopol: Secrets of the Immortals
summary:
Set in France, 2023, a country governed by a dictator who rules by religious absolute power. A mysterious ship shaped like a pyramid has just appeared in the sky and sent representatives to speak with the French government.

As Nikopol, you will find yourself in a suspenseful adventure to find your father and thwart a dangerous conspiracy. Entangled in political intrigue you’re caught between two worlds, one of anarchy and one of Immortality.

name: Nightmares from the Deep: The Cursed Heart
summary:
You are a museum owner pursuing an undead pirate who kidnapped your daughter. You quickly realize that the villain is entangled in a tragic, centuries-old love story, and wants to resurrect his mistress with the girl’s life force. You feel sorry for the pirate, but you have to stop him before it is too late for your daughter…

You will leave the modern museum quickly, and find your way to rundown pirate settings, all of them three centuries old. Since the time of the golden age of piracy, the locations have become neglected, deserted and overgrown with plants. Full moon, bones laying on the ground, and a skull-shaped rock add to the dark atmosphere of the mysterious island.
What tragic events took place on the island before your arrival? What evil powers can make an old, rotting ship sail? Is the horrifying, undead pirate really as evil as he seems?

The player starts each hole by aiming his ball and shooting it toward the green. He then runs toward the ball, in traditional sidescroller fashion, fighting various enemies encountered along the way. These enemies include other ninjas, gophers, birds, giant mutant frogs, sharks and more.
The enemies faced depends on the environment the ninja golfer is currently in. Sharks are encountered in water hazards and snakes in the sand traps. Ninjas are encountered in all the environments, including underwater.

name: Nintendogs: Chihuahua & Friends
summary:
Nintendogs is a realtime pet simulation video game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS handheld video game console. It was first released in Japan, and was later released in North America, Australia, Europe, and other regions. It was originally released in three different versions: Dachshund & Friends, Lab & Friends (Shiba & Friends in Japan), and Chihuahua & Friends. It has been re-released twice since then, first as a bundled release with a special edition Nintendo DS with a new version called Nintendogs: Best Friends, and then later as Nintendogs: Dalmatian & Friends.

Nintendogs uses the DS's touchscreen and built-in microphone. The touch screen allows the player to pet a dog, as well as to use various items that can be found or purchased. These range from balls and frisbees, to toys, to grooming supplies to keep the dogs happy. The microphone is used to call to the player's dog by speaking the name given to the dog in the beginning of the game as well as to teach the dog tricks such as "sit" or "roll over". Players can bring their dogs on walks and to the park if they so choose. They may interact with other players in multi-player by using the DS's wireless linkup. It also uses the DS's internal clock and calendar to allow the dog to grow hungrier or dirtier based on the elapsed time.

Nintendogs received critical acclaim. It has an aggregate score of 85% at Game Rankings, and has won many awards, including the 2006 Innovation Award from PC World and Best Handheld Game from the Associated Press. As of March 31, 2015, all versions of Nintendogs combined have sold 23.96 million copies worldwide, making it second on the Nintendo DS best-sellers list, behind only New Super Mario Bros. Because of Nintendogs' success, Nintendo has made several related products, including Nintendogs toys and a series of Nintendogs trading cards. At E3 2010, it was announced a sequel, titled Nintendogs + Cats, would be released for the Nintendo 3DS.

name: Ninja Gaiden: Master Collection - Version D
Nightmare
summary: Have you ever wondered what is crawling around your bedroom? Creepy dolls, talking toys? Is you're inner self questioning what lurks under your bed at night...

name: Night of Full Moon: Gear of Fate
summary: The machine gave me a second life.When she was born,She was judged by a doctor that she would not survive a year due to cardiacdysplasia.At the insistence of her mother,the mechanical magician replaced her with a mechanical heart.After growing up,She seems to have a special connection with machinery

name: Ninja Code
summary: Ninja Code is a simple to play, but cute turn-based strategy game set in a stunning cyberpunk virtual space. You will strategically navigate fixed spaces on a grid to avoid enemies and reach the exit or take out your target. This beautifully rendered lowpoly-style turn-based strategy game focuses on forward thinking to progress through challenging levels.

name: Ninja Toy Warrior - Legendary Ninja Fight
Nintama Rantarou Mugen no Tsubo Daibousou no Dan
Ninja Ranger: Shinobi Arashi Superhero's Gaiden

In the game you will play a ninja superhero and fight against evil enemies.

name: Nisus Missile Master
summary: A Windows 3.1 Missile Command clone.

name: Nikoli no Sudoku V: Shugyoku no 12 Puzzle
Nightsteel Survivors

name: Nightwalk

Go on a quiet night adventure to find a very special someone. Where could they have gone?

Switch between human and ghost forms to navigate and explore the environment. Delve into graves to speak with the deceased. Reflect during a silent journey in the night.

name: Nitro Nation Stories
summary: A racing game developed by Creative Mobile.

name: Night of The Full Moon: Memory in mirror
summary: Set before Diary of Little Red Riding Hood, Black Swan stumbles upon a magical mirror and is sucked into the Mirror World. summary:

- Nitroplus Blasterz: Heroines Infinite Duel
- 3D Crystal Art
- Original Soundtrack CD
- Visual Book
- DLC

name: Nintama Rantarou GB: E-awase Challenge Puzzle
Nimble Strong
summary:
Ridiculously fun video game that teaches you how to mix cocktails. Nimble Strong is endorsed by The New York Times, Polygon, Engadget, and 10,000+ customers.
Nimble Strong: Bartender in Training is one of the most acclaimed iOS games ever created. It's a full-on bartending course that doubles as a video game. It features an interactive curriculum created by a top cocktail educator (Jeffery Lindenmuth) as well as a deep story and fun game play.

name: Nine Realms: Dawn Touch
summary: Rule the god of thunder and challenge all the gods of the nine realms! In this Rogue-like, hack and slash game, develop your strategy and skills, subject all the gods who challenge you to your wrath, and become the only god of the universe.

name: Nightmare: The Elemental Curse
summary:
Although this game is in development, I don't think right now is the appropriate time to mention the creation of the game until the trailer is done and more content is available. 
 
If you want to find information, keep an eye out on gamejolt. 
 
Goodbye and see you all soon 
- Jesus Barajas (Lead....well.....Everything)

name: Ninja Attack!
summary:
The year: 1984. The place: Brooklyn, New York Dojo Number 7. The time: of no real consequence. 

"Ninja Attack!" is the result of a bizarre thesis statement: If Hunter S. Thompson was head of the art department at the Sega Corporation Ltd. in the early 80s, what would the bonus round in Shinobi look like?

"Ninja Attack!" features:

• 30 psychedelic unlock-able skins
• Augmented Reality (AR) version (play in your own backyard!)
• Hundreds of in-game quests
• Power up weapons including bullets and cash money (make its rain!)
• Haptic feedback
• Optimized for iPhone X
• Leaderboards
• Awesome animated iMessage Stickers
• Social Sharing
• Fast, smooth, easy gameplay
• 3 levels of difficulty: normal, hard, and insane!
• Supports 9 languages

name: Nice Disc: The Last Hot Blood
summary: Hot-blooded action game where you steal, throw, and fling discs to take down your opponents and leave your mark in the vaulted halls of Nice Disc! Up to four players can join the fray in this local multiplayer sports brawler, with both controller and keyboard support.

name: Nice Girl Like Me
summary: Nice Girl Like Me is a 2D leisure game.

name: Niplheim's Hunter: Branded Azel
summary:
A huntress girl in heat was branded with a lewd emblem by evil creatures.
Wearing various costumes (armors), she hunts evil creatures at noon and d*cks at night!!

name: Ninjara Hoi!
summary: Ninjara Hoi! is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by ASCII Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: Ninja Gaiden 3: Collector's Edition
summary:
Ninja Gaiden 3: Collector's Edition

Featuring a new story, new gameplay and new modes, Ninja Gaiden 3 marks a new direction in this fan-favorite franchise. The game will also feature online multiplayer, both co-op and competitive, that will add a completely new experience to Ninja Gaiden.

name: Nikoli no Puzzle V: Shikaku ni Kire
summary:
All 50 questions recorded are handmade by Nikoli's puzzle writer, so the feeling of solving is different!
In addition, the operation unique to PlayStationVita makes it easier to play with problems with large board sizes!
From beginners to advanced players, please enjoy the deep world of puzzles.

name: Nightstar: Rogue Wings
summary: NIGHTSTAR: Rogue Wings is an ARCADE FLIGHT COMBAT GAME. Jump right into the pilot's seat and rise up against an evil Artificial Intelligence that rules the galaxy!

name: Ninja Forest Maze
summary: Help me test the ninja of the cat tribe. Move the blocks on the screen to create a path. You can move the block by scrolling the mouse. If an emergency quest occurs in the middle, you must use it to create a path. If you click on an empty space without a photo, the quest window will disappear.

name: Nitroneers
summary: Nitroneers is a racing and building game where you can burn rubber on an infinite amount of generated tracks in over 50 different vehicles with up to 4 friends. Build traps and contraptions to either trick your opponents or give yourself an advantage.

name: Nightmare Nursery
summary: Run your own small boutique of nightmares

name: Ninja Frogs
summary: The frog village needs your help to fight against evil mutant alligators.

name: Night Cafe
summary: Educational CD-ROM game for Windows 3.1/95 and Macintosh.

name: Ninja Senki
summary: Ninja Senki is a 2D action platform video game created by Canadian indie developer Jonathan Lavigne. It was inspired by classic NES games such as Ninja JaJaMaru-kun and Mega Man. The 8-bit style game has the same resolution as Game Boy console games (160 x 144 pixels).

name: Night at Banban's
summary: Play as a nightwatch looking over a kindegarten school known as BanBan's Kindergarten. Can you keep the mascots at bay and find out the truth?

name: Night Striker
summary: Saturn/PlayStation Port of "Night Striker".

name: Nightmare Shift
summary:
You are alone in the office at night doing your work, feeling tired you decide to go to the kitchen to get a cup of coffee. When you came back to your room, something strange happened to your computer.

Is it your co-worker messing with you? or is it something else messing with you?

name: Nicktoons
summary: The Nicktoons TV Game is a Plug It In & Play TV Games released by Jakks Pacific in 2006 and Developed by Handheld Games, LLC. It is compatible with GameKeys of NK compatibility.

name: Ninja Battle Heroes

name: Night of Full Moon: Witcher - Mirror
summary: Set before Diary of Little Red Riding Hood, Black Swan stumbles upon a magical mirror and is sucked into the Mirror World. On her way to escape from the Mirror World, Black Swan discovers that she is not the only one trapped and with the help of her friends, she begins to search for her memories...

name: Ninja Gear
summary: With the rapid development of science and technology, humans have entered an era of coexistence with intelligent machines. However, a group of militant programmers has transformed these machines into mecha weapons that have annihilated mankind. Just when the situation seems desperate, a group of mech ninjas brings hope to humanity...

name: Ninja Captains
summary: Dig your paws into the adventure of a lifetime!

name: Nightmare
summary: A revolutionary open world MMORPG with night-time PvP mechanics. Customize your character & enter the world of Sylvenus. Go on quests, find treasure, & party with friends. The sky is the limit.

name: Ninja?
summary: Ninja? features a variety of movement abilities to help you traverse a procedurally generated level for endless runner fun.

name: Night Dreams
summary: Experience a tragedy through the eyes of a infant in Night Dreams. A game that features minimal interactivity and a editing style that keeps jumping forward in time. The end result is an often jarring and intense depiction of a broken home.

name: Nice Shot! The Gun Golfing Game
summary: Golf meets FPS in this unique twist on the beloved golf genre. Use a variety of guns and your skills & finesse to rack up bonus points and come in under par! But beware-- this is one golf game that won't hold your hand! Unlock courses and a secret gun in single player, or play against your friends in multiplayer!

name: Night Slashers
summary: The dead have risen from their graves, and monsters and mutants prey upon what's left of the living. Three monster hunters have joined together, using their knowledge of the occult to slay the undead scourge.

name: Night of the Shrub Part 1
summary: Night of the Shrub Part 1 is a short, visual novel, with a single storyline full of October surprises - A boy named Shrub, and his three friends, go looking for adventure in a creepy, abandoned house, and find a whole heap of odd happenings.

name: Nil-Ninjahtic: Ronin
summary: Nil-Ninjahtic: Ronin is a pseudo 8-bit action platformer. While it integrates gameplay mechanics of the previous titles in the series, they are combined in a manner which differentiates itself from its predecessors.

name: Nightshift
summary:
Nightshift is a simple, arcade collect 'em up Game Boy developed for the BeansJam '22. You are working nightshift and desperately try to stay awake.

Drink Kola to stay awake (you gain time). But be aware of hot milk with honey as it will make you drowsy (you lose time). When you run out of time, you will fall asleep. You move automatically, use the D-Pad (Arrow Keys) to change direction.

name: Ninja Savior
summary: MSX tower jumping ninja game made in Europe.

name: Nira Oni
summary:
Nira Oni is an English Ao Oni fangame.

Hiroshi, Takeshi, Mika, Takuro and two new characters called Cassey and Ryan, visit an abandoned hospital, where strange things started to happen since their arrival. Hiroshi ends up separated from his friends after an incident, so he Hiroshi must find them and find a way out. But he must be careful since in that place are monsters known as oni.

name: Nightmares
summary: A game roguelike, 2D plataformer and run and gun. This game has the proposal to unite the thriller/horror genres with the shooter mechanics and where the plot will be crucial throughout the gameplay.

name: Ninja Kato 1
summary: First in the Ninja Kato series! Now available in the nostalgic portable game style! Clear all 4 stages and train Kato!

name: Ninja Painter

name: Nickelodeon Dance 2
summary: The sequel to 2011’s Nickelodeon Dance for the Xbox 360 and Wii.

name: Ninja Painter 2
summary:
Ninjas have never been painting! Prepare for a fast-paced colourful adventure!

Ninja Painter 2 is an arcade puzzle game with addicting gameplay. Paint the walls through 36 levels in 6 different locations and try to get all the achievements!

name: Ninja Attack
summary: You play as a ninja fending off waves of various types of ghosts, each getting increasingly difficult from the last. How many waves can you last before the ghost onslaught overwhelms you.

name: Nightron Wars
summary: The only goal in the Nightron Wars is to win. Nightron needs to be saving and only the best can do it. You can play single or team fights.

name: Night Wizard: The Video Game - Denial of the World
Nintendo Campus Challenge
summary: Nintendo Campus Challenge is a special cartridge used in the events of the same name. There are two different cartridges produced for each event: a Nintendo Entertainment System version for the 1990 competition and a Super Nintendo Entertainment System cartridge for the 1992 competition. The cartridge is considered to be even rarer than the Nintendo World Championships cartridge with only one known to exist.

name: Ninja Kato 3
summary: 【Third in the Ninja Kato series!】 A side-scrolling 2D action game. Control the robot ninja Kato and train him to become a full-fledged ninja.

name: Night Hacking
summary: An interactive story about hacking, unveiling secrets, chatting with people, and searching for purpose.

name: Nib, the Pen is Mightier AS a Sword

name: Nice To Yeet You
summary: Grab your controller, buckle up, and prepare for a face-off like no other in Nice to Yeet You!

name: Nibiru
summary: Inanna crosses space and time with a desire for reparation. With the destruction of a planet imminent, Inanna must stop the Grid from taking over everything. Nibiru is a top-down shooter with an engaging sci-fi story.

name: NinjaGo Endless Runner
summary: NinjaGo Endless Runner is an aptly named endless runner starring ninjas. It is available for Android and iOS and was developed by 9th Impact.

name: Nightmares from the Deep: A Hidden Object Adventure
summary: Nightmares from the Deep: A Hidden Object Adventure is a bold mix of features from one of the most popular HOPA adventure games, and the free-to-play model. Set in the 18th century in the eternal Caribbean, the game allows players to immerse themselves in the colorful world of legendary pirates.

name: Ninja War Stolen Scrolls
summary: Ninja War: Stolen Scrolls is a 2D side-scrolling brawler for up to four players fighting their way cooperatively through levels filled with enemies. Besides moving and jumping, the characters can attack, dodge, and pick up and throw items. There are special abilities that drain a limited MP meter for special attacks, based on an element for each ninja: fire, lightning, water and wind. There is an experience systems with multiple levels that increase the amount of HP and MP.

name: Nigel: The Minuscule Adventure
summary: Welcome to the strange and miraculously existent world of Nigel: The Minuscule Adventure! Explore a not too vast and not very satisfying adventure as Nigel travels across 3 worlds in search of reversing a manifestation created by poor life choices and burnt eggs.

name: Night Guardian
summary: You are a Teddy Bear tasked with keeping the creatures of the night away from your owner's bed.

name: Ninja Gaiden
summary: Port of Ninja Gaiden for DOS.

name: Nightmare Fuel
summary: Elvira has violated her mother's main injunction 'not to mix alcohol with drugs' and is about to die at the underground techno rave. Well-built Pink Rabbit appears unexpectedly and makes a strange proposal (refusal is not accepted). Now, the girl must save the Pink Kingdom, taste cucumber pizza and, who knows, deal with the cockroaches in her mind.

name: Niflheim Academy
summary: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Nitro RC
summary:
Explore the world of gas powered radio controlled vehicles.
Do you prefer an all-terrain rock crawler or a fast dune buggy? Select your favourite car and smash your opponents.
Beat your AI opponents in "Race" mode or improve your driving skills and beat the clock in "Time Trial". You can also select "Practice" mode to drive freely just for fun. Share your best results on the Game Center leaderboard!

name: Nikki no Tabisuru Quiz
summary: Nikki no Tabisuru Quiz was a Japanese only Club Nintendo game which quizzed users about their knowledge on Japan which 3DS users could download

name: Night Raid
summary: A shoot-em-up title developed for the Arcade and PlayStation in 2002 by Takumi, and published by Taito in Japan.

name: NitroZ
summary:
As the coolest mobile racing game, NitroZ is committed to providing the best mobile driving and drifting experience to all players. In order to satisfy your desire for exciting game, we developed the Chasing mode. As a famous street racing car driver, you have already been targeted by polices and you need try to escape from their chasing with you great driving skills.
Not only can you enjoy the racing, you can also join the romantic dance party and make more friends in the game.

name: Nightfall
summary: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Eric Eve.

name: Niiikotopia: Sky Fall
summary: Manage resources, maintain Niiiko’s population, build defenses, research new technology, design new useful items, … and do whatever you can to protect your cute Niiikos.

name: Night Drive
summary: This is a short piece about how I dealt with the end of a relationship.

name: Nightmare at Famine Springs
summary: A Lonely Child prepares to Trick 'r Treat for Halloween.

name: NightMaresToBe
summary: Nightmares is a visual Horror novel game designed to play on the phycological horror of the player A Horror Visual Novel of different themes. Involves puzzles and exploration, with a twist

name: Nightomb
summary:
One level for any limit removing port.

The idea for this PWAD came from iddqd.ru. The main concept is: you should create a level using only two IWAD textures and two IWAD flats.

name: Nickelodeon Pixel Town
summary:
Build your very own Pixel Town in Nickelodeon’s brand-new city building game!

Over 60 characters from 13 popular Nickelodeon shows are moving into Nickelodeon Pixel Town! Meet characters from SpongeBob SquarePants, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (TMNT), The Fairly OddParents and many more in retro pixel art! Can you figure out the correct combinations to collect them all?

Enter the Memory Center to combine Residents using Splat to unlock familiar faces! Learn all the combinations to fill the town! Dress them up with funtastic costumes! Keep everyone happy by completing quests and be rewarded with Splats, Gold and Gems!

Take a ride on the TMNT Party Wagon, and pop by the Krusty Krab for a Krabby Patty! Unlock and build over 60 iconic buildings from your favorite Nickelodeon shows! Decorate your town with over 50 decorative structures like skate parks and palm trees! Expand your land to make space for more Residents and buildings!

Make friends by adding them to your friends list! Visit them every day and check out their Pixel Town! Boost their buildings to get more Gold! Share your Pixel Town with all your friends and compete to see who can collect the most Residents!

name: Night of Full Moon: Little Pig Monster - Crossover
summary: Addition of a limited-time crossover mode, Little Pig Monster will be online soon, with 83 new cards and 18 new monsters. Tailored gameplay, original storyline, let's come to the world of Little Pig Monster and recall those touching moments ......

name: Night of Full Moon: Echoes of Nature - Classic
summary: From an early age, Little Red Riding Hood demonstrates her unique talent, the ability to communicate with spirits. In order to avoid the church, her grandmother took her to settle in a remote cottage, however, escaping did not stop the church messengers.

name: Ninja Lexx
summary: This is a game about an ordinary guy with a guitar, whose life changed after meeting with bandits.The game has a simple but interesting storyline and cinematics/graphics.

name: Nibblemen
summary: Nibblemen is a clone of the Arcade game "Pac-Man"

name: Night Dreamer
summary: Night Dreamer is a single player, side scrolling action game. Make your way across the many different types of blocks while also battling off enemies as you head towards the goal. However, to reach said goal you need to touch special objects in a specific order to receive the key that will open the door to your goal.

name: Nihilist
summary:
In the 25 levels the player duels one enemy each. Additionally there are other ships which shoot both opponents and asteroids which either split when shot or give extras like better armor. There are three arenas: horizontal, vertical and spherical. Every fight costs credits so the player has to pick up money symbols during the fight. When having more money he can spend it on weapon and armor upgrades. The soundtrack features 17 songs from bands like Dog eat Dog, Pop will eat itself and Sugar Ray and can be replaced with another music CD. 
 
"Nihilist: Let the killing begin..." -- UK tag-lined title

name: Nice Cats
summary: Nice Cats is a budget priced game for children. It has four activities on it's main menu, one of which just adjusts the sound levels. The other three activities are:

name: Nightmares from the Deep: Davy Jones
Night Sky
summary: Play with up to three friends and look for all nine of Lucifer's trophies; Limbo, Lust, Gluttony, Greed, Wrath, Heresy, Violence, Fraud and Treachery. Find these trophies while getting chased down by Lucifer in order to win! Offers you many different maps to immerse yourself in.

name: Nightmare
summary: Upcoming original supernatural/sci-fi IP from Bioware

name: Night Castle
summary: Night Castle is a 2D Metroidvania game with a retro art concept. Explore an old castle inhabited by demons and ghosts and purify the darkness with light!

name: Night of Full Moon: Memory Puzzle
summary: To piece together the blurry memories, help from the masters of cards is required. Move your fingers to unlock new stories and illustrations.

name: Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator
summary: Unleash your strategic skills in Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator! Command your army of Swordsmen, Spearmen, and Archers in a stunning 3D world. Analyze enemy formations and develop tactics to lead your ninjas to victory.

name: Nioh 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: Nioh 2: Digital Deluxe Edition is a special edition of the action role-playing game Nioh 2, developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo. Released alongside the base game in March 2020, this edition includes the full game and additional digital content. It features the Season Pass, granting access to all three DLC expansions: The Tengu's Disciple, Darkness in the Capital, and The First Samurai. Additionally, it includes exclusive in-game items such as the Demon Horde weapons and armour set, as well as a Kodama Netsuke charm.

name: Nightmare of Weakest Creature
summary: Eika Ebisu wakes up in hell, convinced that she is in a nightmare. Explore the desolate area, meeting interesting characters and learning more about the world you have been thrust into, solving puzzles along the way. Discover Eika's past, and her potential future in "Nightmare of Weakest Creature".

name: NightHover
summary: The NightCity at night is a hoverbike racing arena. Have fun in 43 levels, gaining speed upgrades, shock powerups to slow other racers, repairing powerups and rockets to shoot kamikaze drones. Switch to the first person view for more immersive gameplay. Plays best with a controller!

name: Nika
summary: A strategy board game for 2-4 players, inspired by ancient Greek warfare!

name: Ninja Stealth 2
summary: Ninja Stealth 2 is the sequel of Ninja Stealth - A.I. Revolution, now as a RPG with more puzzles than sensors.

name: Ninja JaJaMaru: The Great Yokai Battle + Hell
summary: A new game in the Ninja JaJaMaru series, with updated mechanics.

name: Ninja Hunter
summary: Infinite runner with a twist - you play as a ninja being pursued by a mysterious man in a suit.

name: Nimble Numbers Ned
summary: A math edutainment game, featuring the synthesized 'voice' capabilities of the Odyssey 2.

name: Ninja 314
summary:
Don't get fooled by the simple appearance of the main character, this game provides a real challenge. With simple but differentiated mechanics, the game tests the skill of the one who wants to follow the hard path of a ninja.
Ninja 314 is a vertical platform game that requires ability and strategy to overcome obstacles and enemies. Grab the the walls, jump with precision and kill the enemies using special items, in order to reach the top of each stage.

name: Night Catcher
summary: You are the cop who fell asleep in his office. Waking up, you learn of some psychopath who craves for your death and informs of this through notes. Try to get out of the police station avoiding meeting the robot guard.

name: Nine Nines
summary: Dive into the chaotic world of Nine Nines, the ultimate tower defense experience where every playthrough is a unique challenge! Through 3 campaigns and endless procedurally generated maps, you can grind your way into defeating the strongest enemies!

name: Nicodemus: Demon of Evanishment
summary: A collaboration with video game studio Ninja Theory, it is a horror title set shortly after the World's Columbian Exposition in Chicago, where a demon had been unleashed after an accident in an "Electro-Spiritualism exhibit". The experience script was written by Tracy Hickman and then designed and directed by Curtis Hickman. Nicodemus is the first VOID experience to feature two truly divergent endings. It is also the VOID's only example todate of the use of transmedia. A short book was created with clues that would help you in the experience. The experience in turn had information that would reveal the outcome of the book.

name: Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos
summary: 16-bit port of Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos, released in Ninja Gaiden Trilogy.

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Super Mario Bros.
summary: A keychain port of Game & Watch Super Mario Bros.

name: Nightmare Park
summary: You have to cross a park from S to F. While doing this you encounter various mini games. During these mini games you can loose the game or be send back to the beginning.

name: Ninja Jajamaru-kun Ranbu
summary:
Jaleco's popular action game "Ninja Jajamarukun" has been released as a 505 exclusive app. Moreover, it is released as a completely original new work.
Jajamaru-kun will fight the monsters that come his way, using jumps, shuriken, and items on stages themed around the four seasons of spring, summer, fall, and winter. This game adds new actions such as dash, triangle jump, and tackle. Also, the effects of items will become more powerful as you fill up the special move gauge!
In the previous game, you could only destroy blocks above your head, but now you can also destroy blocks above, below, left and right. Also pay attention to the big characters that appear at key points!

"Ninja Jajamaru-kun Ranbu", which is currently being distributed as a 505 series exclusive application, has started distribution in response to the enthusiastic voices of users who said, "I want to play it on 504 as well!" Use shuriken, jumps, and items to shoot down the monsters lined up. Of course, the 504 series will also feature new actions such as dash and triangle jump!

name: Nick Bounty: The Goat in the Grey Fedora - Remastered
summary: A complete modern remake of the award-winning 2005 Flash game. This comedy detective game blends classic mystery storytelling with clever puzzle solving all in an entertaining package that spoofs the classic film noir movies of the black-and-white era.

name: Ninja Gainyk 2
summary: In this game, you have to stack your score by cutting the paint balls that are thrown in the air in front of you while you have a time that keeps tracks of the duration of your trainings.

name: Nigel
summary: Nigel is a single player, puzzle experience where you play as Nigel the Gannet. While on Mana Island, you will be playing matchmaker and helping the other animals on the island find true love, perhaps even finding it yourself!

name: Night Freak
summary: A retro style horror game with silent hill style camera, tank controls, vhs filters, and survival horror elements.

name: Nine Nights: Martial Ci Lang Story
summary: Unleash Your fighter Instinct: Survival Means Never Surrender

name: NinMaki
summary: This is different from the general ninja game, because you will play a "ninegg", a novice ninja. There are so few skills that you can't even attack the enemy!? Take advantage of everything around you, avoid a lot of killing, collect broken scrolls, and challenge the final BOSS.

name: Nine Tiles
summary:
Welcome to NineTiles: The anagram puzzle game that challenges your vocabulary and the speed of your wits.
Battle against the clock to create as many words as you can in survival mode or take a relaxed approach and test your word knowledge with clues and without time pressure in the main game mode. Compete with friends to see who can get to the top of the leaderboards and be the sharpest tile in the box.

name: Nixie
summary: A 2D action game following the reclusive Fiona Soul, and her adventures fighting spirits and racing across London.

name: Nifty Smashers
summary: A cross-play online multiplayer game that blends elements of a casual party survival experience with the fast-paced action of a platform fighter!

name: Nirvana
summary: Wake up and embrace your new powers. In this Bullet Hell Fast-FPS, dare to take on mystical creatures to defeat the God Raj. Nirvana awaits...

name: Ninja Fun
summary: Ninja Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Niplheim's Hunter - Branded Azel
summary: Play as the hunter girl Azel and battle monsters with equipment made of their corpses while searching for the Black Demon Beast that branded her.

name: Nine of Wands
summary:
Nine of Wands is an allegorical puzzle game about my thoughts on consumerism.

Solve puzzles which consist of physics-driven monopole magnets!

You can control magnets to make a way to the exit, connect wires, or transform the environment.

name: Nick Faldo Plays the Open

name: Ninja Break

Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory.

name: Night Attack: Touge

name: Ninjish Guy in Low-Res World

You don't know how. You don't know why. All you know is you are in the depths of a strange facility.

The path in front of you is a dangerous path. But it's the only path available.

So it begins...

Ninjish Guy in Low-Res World is a platform game where you have to jump, slide and stomp your way through more than forty labyrinthine screens plagued with enemies, fire, sharks and other hazards, plus some tough bosses that will try to destroy you.

name: Nightmare Circus

Afterwards, the Jester was convicted for the deaths of the fire victims, but before he was executed, the Jester warned that the souls of the victims would be forever tormented. Many years later, a Native American man named Raven who had lost relatives to the fire goes to investigate the site where the circus was held, and where strange happenings have been reported.

name: Ninja Sentai Hurricanger & Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger: Chou Sentai Super Battle

name: Night Bound

It uses the Sega Mega Modem and a subscription VAN service to display game action in real time, and to save games for later viewing. As such, it cannot be properly emulated yet. Nikkan Sports provided the service under the VAN name.

name: Ninja Tycoon

The young female pilot Rei from the Steel Fox is sent on a decisive mission, codenamed "Night Slave" - an assault on the terrorist base.

name: Nightmare Trails

name: NightKnight

summary: Take JaJaMaru and Shizuha against treacherous forces to rescue Princess Sakura.

name: Nila Dhuma

name: Night of the Shrub Part 2
summary: Night of the Shrub Part 2 is a short, visual novel, with a single storyline rife with odd happenings - The continuing adventures of Shrub and his friends as they wind their way through the creepy Old Twermbly Place.

name: Ninja Taro
summary:
High Adventure in the Far East
It's the era of feudal war in Japan. One Shogun struggles to unite the provinces, but he needs help.
His villainous arch-rival is rumored to be dead, but a merciless legion of anarcy continues to plague the countryside. If he is dead, then who could be leading th evil forces which prevent Japan from attaining peace and order?

This chaos must be stopped!
From the ranks of the Phantom sect to the Shogun's aid comes Ninja Taro. With the cunning of a thief, the skill of a master, and a legendary sword, he must venture forth to tame the minions of evil, and unravel the riddle that will unite the empire!

name: Night Class: A Vampire Story

name: Night Manor

Trapped in a nightmare where you must use your wits to survive and escape!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Ninja in Training

name: Night Escape
summary: Night Escape is a tense and strategic multiplayer game. Uncover the hidden assassin, solve puzzles, and escape the mysterious mansion before it's too late. Survive the night or become a victim. Embark on this deadly race for survival.

name: NinjaFall
summary: NinjaFall is a ninja combat game. Inspired by new-classics from Duck Game to TowerFall, it's a 4-player local and online fighting game centering around creating your own Ninjutsu to use in versus matches.

name: Ninja Instinct
summary: A very small rage game based on the capacity of the player to guess the intention of the level design.

name: Nicktoons: Battle for Volcano Island
summary: Nintendo DS port of Nicktoons: Battle for Volcano Island.

name: Nitemare 3D
summary:
Nitemare 3D (N3D) is a first-person shooter PC game with a horror theme, released by Gray Design Associates in 1994 for MS-DOS and Windows 3.1x platforms. It consisted of three episodes with ten levels in each episode, with the first episode being was released as shareware. The full release came on two 3½" floppy disks and was accompanied by a guide to the game's thirty levels. The graphics were similar to those used in Wolfenstein 3D or Ken's Labyrinth, with perpendicular walls and no textures on the floors or ceilings. The music in Nitemare 3D was composed by David B. Schultz (also composed for Quiver).

Nitemare 3D follows the story of Hugo, from the Hugo trilogy, a series of graphic adventure PC games consisting of Hugo's House of Horrors, Hugo II, Whodunit?, and Hugo III, Jungle of Doom!. Penelope, Hugo's girlfriend, has been kidnapped by the evil Dr. Hamerstein for use in heinous experiments. Hugo must battle through Hamerstein's bizarre mansion, underground caverns complete with prisons and laboratories, and finally through a twisted alternate dimension of demons and aliens in an attempt to save her.

name: Nibbles
summary:
Nibbles is a simple video game and variant of Snake. It was inspired by an early 1980s game called Hustle from the Radio Shack TRS-80 micro-computer. (It was not influenced by Mozaik Software's 1984 Amstrad CPC game, Nibbler, despite the similar names.) Nibbles was written in QBasic by Rick Raddatz, who later went on to create small business companies such as Xiosoft and Bizpad.

The game's objective is to navigate a virtual snake (or worm) through a walled-space while consuming numbers (from 1 through 9) along the way. The player must avoid colliding with walls, other snakes or their own snake. Since the length of the snake increases with each number consumed, the game increases in difficulty over time. After the last number has been eaten, the player progresses to the next level, with more complex obstacles and increased speed. There is a multiplayer mode which allows a second player to control a second snake by using a different set of keys on the same keyboard.

Nibbles originally became popular because it was included with MS-DOS version 5.0 and above. Written in QBasic, it is one of the programs included as a demonstration of that programming language. The QBasic game uses the standard 80x25 text screen to emulate an 80x50 grid by making clever use of foreground and background colors, and the ANSI characters for full blocks and half-height blocks. Microsoft's 24kB QBasic version was copyrighted in 1990. Because of MS-DOS's prevalence at that time, it was available on almost every PC in the early 1990s. Modern computer speeds have rendered the game-speed-delay timing loops invalid, and thus the QBasic version of Nibbles requires some code changes to operate correctly on modern PCs. However, the adjustable clock rate on the DOSBox DOS emulator allows the original code to run at speeds similar to those on the original hardware. Nibbles is also runnable on QB64 as a way to avoid emulation.

name: Nightruth: Futatsu Dake no Shinjitsu
summary: "Futatsu Dake no Shinjitsu" ("The Only Two Truths") is the third and final game in the Nightruth series, this time starring the youngest of Shinya's classmates, Ai Himekawa. The story focuses on her previously unexplained powers of precognition and telekinesis. Gameplay is again similar to the visual novel-style adventure presentation of the previous entries, featuring voiced and illustrated story sequences which occasionally branch via player choice into multiple endings. However, rather than featuring stories about famous supernatural phenomena, the focus this time is strictly on the main characters and their own personal stories.

name: Niaki
summary:
There is a new Game in Town!
Niaki is a simple addictive game with an unique gameplay!
Try to regroup every color on the board but remember: A group can be formed only if it is bigger than the one destroyed.

name: Nightmare in the Old Mansion
summary: "Nightmare in the Old Mansion" is a first-person indie horror game where John, a real estate agent, receives a call to evaluate an old mansion and will have to fight for his life.

name: Night of Full Moon: Witch - Wishing
summary: When the priest is defeated by Little Red Riding Hood, the witch discovers many ancient and mysterious magic books in the priest's hut. Out of her search for the truth of magic, she spent her days engrossed in reading those ancient tomes.

name: Night Shift
summary: Night Shift is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel that focuses on Urban experiences. The game is packed with humor, sex, romance, crime, action, drama, and an intriguing story. Play as a young black male trying to figure out his path or a young white former star athlete trying to prove his worth.

name: Nightmare Diary
summary: Nightmare Diary is a Yume Nikki fangame. The main character is KNF, who has bloodstains all over him in the real world. In the dream world he is known as Ketsueki (血液, lit. Blood Liquid), and the bloodstains are removed. Your main goal is to explore the dream world and obtain effects. There is plenty of dialogue in the game as well.

name: Night Keep
summary: In Night Keep you build your own empire and defend it against waves of enemies.

name: Night Light
summary: The personifications of Night and Light learn to get along. Discover each other’s unique skills to help both Night and Light come to realize that new paths will open up if they work together.

name: Ninja Ga-Lee

Run as far as you can while dodging obstacles, collecting coins, picking up health, and attacking enemies as they attempt to stop you from the ultimate Ninja Training session, The Ninja Ga-Lee.

name: Ninja Remix
summary:
This is an updated version of "Last Ninja 2: Back With a Vengeance". The differences are a short intro, some minor graphic changes and a remixed soundtrack. Gameplay is exactly the same as in Last Ninja 2.

Amiga and Atari ST version of Last Ninja Remix was a remake, with both graphical and sound enhancements, of The Last Ninja, first game of the saga, that was never published for 16 bit computers.

name: Nihon Daihyou Team no Kantoku ni Narou! Sekaihatsu, Soccer RPG
summary: Nihon Daihyou Team no Kantoku ni Narou! Sekaihatsu, Soccer RPG is a soccer-themed RPG by Sega and Enix released on the Sega Saturn exclusively in Japan in 1998.

name: Ninja Gaiden
summary: A handheld electronic port of Ninja Gaiden, released in 1989.

name: Night Spasm
summary: Night Spasm is an open-world action adventure pixel-art-style RPG game that features a turn-based combat battle system, unique characters, and a dark, deep story. Take control of three main characters to restore a corrupt sci-fi/medieval world originally created to cheat death...

name: Nightmare Pop

name: Ninja Clan

name: Ninja Tobu

In Ninja Tobu, speed and accuracy are key, as you guide your ninja through platforms, enemies, and spikes.

Use power-ups to triple jump, throw ninja stars and slow time. Collect coins in endless and challenge modes. Spend them on chests containing different ninjas with accessories and effects.

name: Ninja Origin
summary: Role-playing game with the best gameplay in the MMORPG series…

name: NinCat
summary: Help the Ninja Cat go through the countless different Japanese villages, quickly perform the most awesome jumps, unlock new skills and complete all the 50 levels of this wonderful game.

name: Nine Treasures of Liuyin
summary: This is a dark, soul like role-playing game, trying to create a different experience in this genre. The protagonist fights against a powerful enemy in this city in search of a divine artifact.

name: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger
summary: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger is a game based on the TV series Ninja Sentai Kakuranger released for the Sega Pico. Not much is known about the game currently due to lack of preservation.

name: NightCrawler
summary: Enter the world of NightCrawler! NightCrawler is a wave-based FPS in a semi-voxel style. Dash through the night where you battle zombies, werewolves, ghosts, and reptilians from outer space!

name: NitroClash.io
summary:
NitroClash.io is a multiplayer browser soccer IO game humbly inspired from Rocket League.
3vs3 games
challenging physics
play with mouse, keyboard or gamepad
in-game actions (goals, shots, assists, saves...) that rewards points
levels, ranks, achievements (medals)
leaderboards
Lots of fun !

name: Nintendo Pennant Chase Baseball

name: Nightmare in the Toy Factory

Enter Flynn and his twin brother Floyd, two virtuous leprechauns who refuse to sit idly by while the Tyrant weaves his dreadful delusions. Get going, gents! There's no time to lose!

name: Ninja Battle
summary: Hiding Skills, which can hide the user's appearance even in the daylight. Clone Technique that creates copies of the user. Various Ninjutsu that makes the user breathe fire and bends the earth. You can experience a ninja with all of those skills at "Ninja Battle".

name: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: New Year's Celebration

Nightmare Castle is an extended technical demonstration and a surreal adventure game, built as a platform to test reduction and refinement of RPG Maker's VFX to PC-88 or early PC-98 standards. As such, the game uses 3-bit graphics at a resolution of 640x400.

A re-imagining of Amiha's Nightmare Castle, the game uses an 8-color palette and minimalist audio with Yume Nikki-style gameplay.

name: Ninja Numpties

name: Nijuubako
summary: The Nijuubako fandisc featuring 2 scenarios.

name: Nioh: Defiant Honor

Released in July 2017, this expansion continues the story of protagonist William as he becomes embroiled in the historic siege of Osaka. Defiant Honor introduces new story missions, sub-missions, and Twilight missions, providing additional content for players to explore. It features new characters, including the legendary samurai Sanada Yukimura, along with new enemies and challenging bosses. The DLC also adds new weapons, armour, and items, enhancing the game's combat mechanics and customisation options

name: Ninja Ball

name: Nightbeast VR

name: Nights To Remember

name: Night shot

name: Ninku 2: Tenkuuryuu he no Michi
summary: Ninku 2: Tenkuryuu he no Michi is a Sega Game Gear sequel to Ninku.

name: Nintendoji
summary:
A special DSiWare game from Nintendo, it was created for Platinum member of the Japanese Club Nintendo.

The title was romanized as "Nintendoji" in the Super Smash Bros. series.

name: Night Castle
summary: Night Castle is an "RPG" game. Explore a huge castle, learn powerful spells, fight terrible creatures, uncover ancient secrets ...

name: Ninku: Tsuyokina Yatsura no Daigekitotsu!
summary: A Ninku 2D fighting game.

name: Ninjapple
summary: Ninjapple is a crazy 2D platformer in which you need to collect the five elemental medalions to bring peace back to the world ! Take part in this adventure throughout many levels !

name: Ninety Thousand Acres
summary:
Use your strategic mind in relaxing gameplay!
How many acres of land can you develop from 1 acre?

name: Night Driver
summary: Atari will release a new version of the company’s classic racing game, Night Driver, more than 40 years after the original hit arcades. The new game, simply titled Night Driver, is coming to Android and iOS devices.

name: Nightingale Downs
summary: You play a deer, tasked by your clan leader with a most urgent mission: Find and sabotage the plans of a local human settlement, intent on destroying your homeland. Your journey will be long, through dangerous jungles and facing many natural predators. Will you save your home?

name: Night House
summary: A game written by Bitter Karella for the Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Nightout

name: Nightfighter
summary: Comando Noturno! (Night Commando!) is a combat flight simulator. The player controls a fighter plane on a night mission, and his task is to take off, destroy the target, avoid enemy attack and return to base.

name: Nino Maze Lofi
summary: First maze game that combines lo-fi songs and cute graphics.

name: Night of the Shrub Part 3
summary: Night of the Shrub Part 3 is a short, visual novel, with a single story line rife with odd happenings - The continuing adventures of Shrub and his friends as they travel to other worlds and back again in an attempt to save the creepy Old Twermbly Place.

name: Nihon Sumo Kyokai Kounin: Nihon Oozumou Gekitou Honbasho-hen
Nicolay's Adventure
summary:
Small game about Nikolay's adventures.Protect
your house from monsters.

name: Nitroverse
summary: Nitroverse is a rogue-like hack & slay with level-based progression.

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle - Chapter III: "Legal Stage"
summary: Race for justice in this anime-themed graphic adventure game! Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle - Chapter III: "Legal Stage" is the third release in the episodic NALE series. This has now been delisted for anyone who doesn't already own it; the content of this game was rolled into the collected release "Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One".

name: Nightraiders
summary: A vertical scrolling shoot'em up written by Peter Filiberti and published by Datamost for the Atari 8-bit home computers.

name: Night of Terror
summary: A 2D Indie Horror Game, explore the world and find out what is truly happening during this Night of Terror!

name: Nine Lives Ninja: Explore!
summary: Take control of a cat (who also happens to be a ninja) in this platformer with metroidvania elements! Explore the ancient cave system and find new powers to help you overcome obstacles in your search for the Fountain of Kitty Youth.

name: NITE Team 4: Operation Withering Dusk
summary: A major data breach has left Kotok Analytics security in question. They hire NT4 to find the data, destroy it, and attempt to bring the perpetrators to justice.

name: Nick Extreme Sports
summary: A cancelled Nickelodeon game for the HyperScan.

name: NIRA Intense Import Drag Racing
summary: Drag racing featuring 10 import cars and 20 tracks

name: Ninja Girl
summary: A full-scale action game in which one Kunoichi fights against ninjas and necromancers during the Warring States period.

name: Nighthaw-X3000
summary: Nighthaw-X3000 is a classic, arcade shoot'em up. Shoot everything on sight and don't get killed. Do it by yourself or in local, couch co-op.

summary:
One day, Nicolás was hungry, so he decides to make a seaweed burger, but something he didn't know is that the burger was the most perfect burger that was ever cooked.
Suddenly, Loquendumbo breaks into his house and steals the burger! Don't let that bastard easily get away with your burger, control Nicolás and travel through the inmense and amazing underwater world!

name: Ninja Junk Punch
summary: Ninja Junk Punch is an iPod/iPad game. Featuring Trent the Lumberjack fighting Ninjas.

name: Nia
summary: For over a century, a kilometer high crust of ice has covered the earth sealing in and preserving the lost surface world…... Icepunk prospectors scour the frozen tundra, tunneling through the frosty depths to caverns of former cities and malls rich in resources of the before time…..

name: Ninja USA

This little guy will use his ninja skills, kunai and shurikens to make his way through the levels and save the country from these annoying balls. He has to shoot the falling balls until they disappear, and make sure one never hits him. Created with amazing colorful graphics, Ninja USA is sure to bring you a lot of fun.

name: Nintendo DSi Metronome
summary: The Nintendo DSi Metronome software can be used to help keep tempo –when playing an instrument, for example.

name: Nikola Tesla: War of the Currents
summary: Help the eccentric inventor navigate the intrigue of the emerging electrical industry! Can you outsmart Thomas Edison and electrify the world?

name: Ninja Assault
summary: A game featured in Action 52.

name: Ninpaw
summary: Enter the arena and fight your friends in local multiplayer combat. Play as cute cats, master your skills and play through game modes to reign supreme over your opponents.

name: Ninja Soul
summary: Ninjasoul is a platform action game that combines roguelite with Galaxy warrior demon city. Kunoichi, Tachibana Yachiyo unexpectedly awakened the ability of "death backtracking". She will find the truth in the land that used to be her hometown in the fight and death again and again.

name: Ninth Hotel
summary: You are trapped in a Hotel by accident Find out all the signs of abnormality in the hallway Escape by going down to the first floor while carefully observing your surroundings

name: Nightmare Burger Hell
summary: A burger eating sim

name: Niggle (Oh Hell!)
summary: An card game in which you must guess how many tricks you are going to win each round. The fun comes from trying to get exactly the number of wins you guessed while stopping your opponents from achieving their target.

name: Nightfall House
summary: Nightfall House is a first-person walking simulator game that allows you to feel as if someone is always around.

name: Niflhel Survival
summary: In the role of a Viking who escaped from the kingdom of the dead, you have to survive in the harsh world of ice and fog in Niflheim.

name: Night Creatures

Hecate's bite has given you the power to change into a wolf, a bear, and other animals to battle hordes of monsters and ghouls who protect her. You must search for the one correct route through level after level of unspeakable terror to find her. Choose the most devastating weapons and become the animal best able to fight each fiend. Will you defeat Hecate or become her grotesque slave for eternity? Either way, the Queen of Darkness waits for you!

name: Night of Full Moon: Contract of Soul
