With but one more soul, she will complete the contract with the Reaper. However, to find the one last soul is more difficult than she could have imagined...

name: Nimble Bunn

name: Ninnin
summary: "Fifty City," where ordinary people and ninjas live together. However, the city is in turmoil due to ruthless "hunter" gangs. Ninja girl "Ninnin" infiltrates a gang to save the city!!

name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game
summary: Get ready for a story so epic it could only unfold in the corridors of the world's largest museum--the Smithsonian Institution. Museum guard-turned entrepreneur Larry Daley discovers that his favorite exhibits, and some of his best friends, from New York's Natural History Museum are being shipped off to the archives at the Smithsonian. Larry gets a distress call from the miniature cowboy, Jedediah, reporting that Egyptian ruler Kahmunrah and a trio of heinous henchmen--namely Ivan the Terrible, Napoleon and Al Capone--are plotting to take over the museum, then the world. Speeding to the nation's capitol, Larry is clearly in over his head. But with some impressive new pals, including the irrepressible Amelia Earhart, along with familiar friends Teddy Roosevelt and Octavius, Larry will stop at nothing to restore the Smithsonian before dawn.

name: Nikoli no Puzzle 4: Hitori ni Shitekure
Nick Faldo's Championship Golf
summary: Arc Developments created a 3D game world called Reality3 for this simulation, licensed around one of Britain's top players. There are two courses, plus a hidden 9-hole course on Mars with reduced gravity, with match play and stroke play options against one of 8 varied-difficulty computer players.

name: Ninjahtic
summary: Ninjahtic is an action/adventure platformer with elements of puzzle-solving and stealth. While it's progression is linear, the open-ended nature of every level requires exploration of an abandoned civilization located atop floating islands. Usage of the environment also plays a key role when solving puzzles and dispatching enemy robots throughout.

name: Ninpu Sentai Hurricanger
summary: A Japanese "power ranger" genre game. Brawler/fighter with a mix of live action cut-scenes.

name: Ninety8
summary:
Ninety8 is a card puzzle you'll love from the very first second. Really easy to learn, but extremely hard to reach the final card.
Pick it up for a few minutes when traveling, or dive into the mesmerizing gameplay for hours and hours. We bet you'll have a really hard time reaching the top card, but lots of fun while trying.

name: Nightowl
summary: Old friends reunite over a chat room.

name: NightMetal
summary: Descend into the abyss of a world controlled by a mysterious and ominous super AI. Pilot your bio-mechanically connected mecha, Krypt, through the eerie and dystopian cityscapes as you confront the unknown lurking in the shadows.

name: Nightmare Survival
summary: A nightmare with a toy Kalashnikov assault rifle. Survive killing monsters, which are increasing every minute.

name: Nibbly '92
summary:
Nibbly '92 is a new version of the classic game Nibbler for the C64.
In this game you control a worm named Nibbly and need to eat all drops in the level to proceed. However eating makes Nibbly grow longer.

name: Nightmare
summary: In Nightmare the player controls a visitor to a haunted mansion. The goal is to escape from it through a constantly moving hatch in the attic. His job will be made harder by the ghosts who are still lingering around the house. The player has to climb three floors to reach the attic, and there is one ghost for each floor.

name: Nishan Shaman
summary: The Legend of Nishan Shaman is a traditional tale passed down by Northeastern Chinese minority tribes for thousands of years. The tale is about how a female shaman named Nishan saved the soul of a young boy from evil.

name: Night Trap
summary: FMV glitch puzzle

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Star Trek
summary: A Nintendo Mini Classics original game based on Star Trek.

name: Night Detective
summary: Night Detective is an adventure point and click puzzle game! The game is centered around the mysterious man who only appears under the cover of darkness. This man is only known by the name of "Night Detective". Some people believe he is a criminal, others believe he is strange, and the rest do not know what to believe. For most, his existence is only a rumor. Click through levels by solving puzzles, exploring, and collecting new items to reach different areas! Become the Night Detective. See this new world through his magnifying glass. Are you ready for the adventure, detective?

name: Night Magic
summary: Are you ready to face an eerie and unknown mystery? Are you ready to abandon the world and plunge into the most complex puzzles? This is not a game where you can go, knocking heads of monsters.

name: Night Racer: Street Racing 3D
summary:
Compete in 3 different game modes, championship mode, Arcade Mode and Time Trial. The game features over 8 different cars to choose from. Ranging from sports cars all the way buses. A unique Futuristic Artstyle has been created to immerse you into the game world.
The opponent AI in the game is a marquee feature as well. It learns the way you drive and keeps getting better, making the game challenging as you keep playing. Right now the game features 5 unique tracks, each have their own sets of obstacles and challenges for you to overcome. While you're racing watch out for the opponents who like to go rogue and push you off the edges of the track.

name: Nick Chase a Detective Story
summary: Nick Chase, a hard-boiled Private Investigator, is in need of a job. Lucky for him, one arrives from a man known only as The Collector. Solve a variety of puzzles and find hidden clues to uncover the mystery behind the missing manuscript penned by Leonardo Di Vinci.

name: Ninja Go!!
summary:
Began training hard to become the strongest ninja.
Is a prerequisite for speed and agility of a ninja.
You need to be hard and difficult for novice ninja ultimate ninja force you.
Ultimate ninja way depends on your hands.

name: Nichibutsu Collection 2
summary: Nichibutsu Collection 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nichibutsu, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Nightly Trash
summary: You're an average-joe in a 1950's like aesthetic, working at a diner while taking out the trash. Each night has different events as you play through, so keep your eyes open for anything... off...

name: Nightshift Nightmares
summary: In Nightshift Nightmares, navigate a night of horror in a mysterious asylum. Follow eerie rules, avoid dark entities, and uncover secrets to survive until dawn. Will you escape, or succumb to the nightmares?

name: Nightmare without return
summary: This is a journey without return When you wake up... In the strange space, the bronze gate that eats people, the strange rules of the game, and the ever-changing nightmare world appear in front of you Everything starts from here

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl: Hugh Neutron
summary:
Hugh Neutron joins Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl! Jimmy Neutron’s goofy dad and his signature style makes its way to the brawl with duck-themed moves and other crazy abilities!

This pack features:
· Playable brawler Hugh Neutron
· Alternate Hugh costume
· Duck, Duck, Pie! Stage

name: Nick Sports
summary: Welcome to Nick Sports, a slime-covered athletic extravaganza! Test your skills and flick your way to Basketball, Soccer and Baseball glory! Climb the rankings from Rookie to World Champ in this ultimate sports challenge. Play Soccer, Basketball and Baseball in the Nick Sportsplex!

name: Nightmare Grotto
summary: Nightmare Grotto is a horror-themed monster wave shooter for the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. How long can you survive?

name: Nightmare Drive
summary: survive against your ghosts

name: Nitro Nation: Drag Racing
summary: Race, mod, and tune dozens of real licensed cars. Start a team, invite your friends, win tournaments. Trade car parts with other racers in real time and build your dream car for both Drag and Drift races!

name: Ninja Blast
summary: Independent action game that features an action game mode and a stealth game mode, with strong narrative and graphic violence.

name: Ninja Roquinexu
summary: You have challenged a criminal Syndicate, but are you strong enough to make it all the way up to the end?

name: Nine Paradise: The Origin
summary: A Roguelike card game. In addition to hundreds of basic cards, there are also unique ways to practice martial arts and spells, and dozens of powerful magic artifacts and pets with their own characteristics, making the game more fun.

name: Ninelives
summary: Ninelives is an open world online RPG focused on freely searching and adventuring in a unique world and building characters with items and skills. We aim to create a game where players can enjoy the pleasures of simple RPG, such as discovering, collecting, battling, in their own relaxed pace. Step into this broad land and experience the unknown world.

name: Ninja Cats
summary:
Monsters have invaded Cat Planet!
Grow your ninja cats and keep the peace in the cat world.

Collect cute neon cats and unique skins.

Enjoy spectacular battles with the weapons and skills of ninjas with attributes.

name: Ninja World Adventure
summary: Protect your village by using your powers and explore the outside world !

name: Night Driver
summary: Port of the Night Driver arcade game with added color visuals and a changed third person perspective.

name: Ninja Kid
summary: Ninja Kid (regional port of GeGeGe no Kitaro: Yokai Daimakyou) is a NES platformer published by Bandai. As with Super Mario Bros 2, Ninja Kid went through some significant changes for its US release.

name: Nightslink
summary: You are the Nightslink. Traverse abandoned roads under cover of night. Deliver cassette tapes in a post-apocalyptic world. An atmospheric retro-3D horror adventure.

name: Nikoli no Sudoku 3D Dai-ni-Shuu: 8-tsu no Puzzle de 1000-Mon
Ninja Burai Densetsu
summary:
Ninja Burai Densetsu is a 1991 strategy game by Sega for the Sega Mega Drive released exclusively in Japan.

The game plays similarly to other strategy games such as SystemSoft's Daisenryaku games and Sega's own Shining games. You are in control of a team of ninjas fighting another team. C selects a ninja/confirms an action. B cancels an action, or if no action is in progress, selects the next ninja. A opens the battle menu, which allows you to end your turn. Battles are fully automatic. Unique to Ninja Burai Densetsu are side-scrolling special stages: should you move a ninja onto a special space, they will go into a town where they can get various helpful items from townsfolk.

name: Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos
summary: The MS-DOS port of Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos.

name: Night of Horror
summary: You are on the night shift at the bank. You hear noises all the time. You need to find out what they are and find your partner. As you pass, you will need to find the keys and open locked rooms.

name: Nightfall
summary: A social deduction game for 4-12 players where the Humans must determine which players are Werewolves and vote them out before they transform at night! Use equipment such as Invisibility, Blood Test & Camera and gather evidence to use to vote out others. Features special player roles.

name: Nickelback Revenge
summary: A Tap Tap Revenge game featuring Nickelback songs.

name: Nine Days
summary: 9 Days brings a psychological horror experience where you play as a father. One time, someone kidnaps your child, and The kidnapper asks for money if he wants his child safe. In the end, you must find a way to make money as fast as possible and try to survive by hiding from them.

name: Ninja
summary: Prepare for an intense clash of strategy in Ninja Empires, an online real-time strategy game that combines the essence of Clash with the stealthy world of ninjas!

name: Nintendo PowerFest '94
summary: Nintendo PowerFest '94 was a 1994 Nintendo-promoted video game competition. Most of the town competitions were held in customized trailers outside of department stores. It was based on scoring points in a special Game Pak. The three Super Nintendo Entertainment System games (Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels, Super Mario Kart, and Ken Griffey, Jr. Presents Major League Baseball) were played within a time limit of six minutes.

name: Nightmare traveler
summary: Save your sister from a monster that stalks her in nightmares.

name: Nintendo 3DS Sound: Soccer
summary: Nintendo 3DS Sound: Soccer is an easter egg game built into the Nintendo 3DS Sound application.

name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
summary: 16-bit port of Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom, released in Ninja Gaiden Trilogy. It is based on the Japanese version of the game, which is more balanced than the North American version.

name: Ninja Saga
summary: A leading casual RPG which allows you to create and customize your own Ninja, train up with more than 1,000+ animated Jutsu, Missions, Weapons, Pets. Challenge your friends in real time PvP battles. Clan system is up and running, Play now!

name: Nice Jumper
summary: Ready to test your reaction?

name: Ninjas Busters: Whack A Ninja
summary: When whack-a-mole meets Ninjas. Discover "Whack A Ninja", an arcade-type indie game created by Chris Braibant. Beat all the ninjas in this intense, action-packed game, in the pursuit of the best score and sadistic pleasure of experimenting with all the ways to eliminate those cowled suckers.

name: Nibblet
summary: A fun little game where you must eat all the dots, but at the same time avoiding your ever growing tail!

name: Nile: Passage to Egypt
summary: Players undertake an interactive journey down the Nile River through modern and ancient Egypt on an Egyptian sailing boat called a felucca. Players explore local culture and interact with customers via virtual tours. The player navigates through a series of 360 degree screens, or can also choose new locations via a map.

name: Nirvana Revenge
summary: A Tap Tap Revenge game featuring Nirvana's greatest hits.

name: Ninja Warrior: Shadow of Samurai
summary: RPG Fighting Action game brings you a new experience of free fighting style, are you ready to challenge this new turn based RPG!

name: Night Guard
summary: Night Guard is a short horror game with retro style, based on the 80s.

name: Ninja Gaiden Clans
summary:
Ninja Gaiden Clans brings Team Ninja's franchise to mobile devices with a focus on social networking.

Ninja Gaiden Clans is a social game for Android and iOS devices based on the Ninja Gaiden franchise. It was originally announced at the Tokyo Game Show and E3 and released in Japan in 2012. The action gameplay is similar to Ninja Gaiden: Dragon Sword, featuring very similar touch-based controls. The game also involves card collection trading, like many other Mobage games.

It was announced to be released in North America in 2012, but was never released.

name: Night of the Scarecrows
summary: Wrong turn, wrong place. Now you are in the middle of nowhere, surrounded by horde of faceless creatures... and you are very short on ammo.

name: Ninkyo Dantai
summary: Ninkyo Dantai is a 3D top-down, role-playing video game developed by TeamCS1. It is the first mainline title in the Ninkyo Dantai franchise developed as a turn-based RPG.

name: Nifty League
summary:
Nifty League is a blockchain-based, arcade-style collection of games.

Nifty League isn't just any gaming league, we're a group of hardcore competitive gaming degenerates set out to disrupt an entire industry.
Our community members own their characters (by way of non-fungible tokens/NFTs), get to earn $NFTL token by playing (play to earn, renting characters, etc), have a say in the direction of the entire project as its set to be fully community governed and decentralized, and a whole slew of other perks & benefits.

name: Nightclub Royale: Let's Party!
summary: Run your nightclub and collect Epic and Legendary DJ and Dancer cards to lure in guests. Hire bodyguards, choose banger songs, mix cocktails, and resolve any sudden disturbances. Even if you start in small venues, tactical skills and economical savvy will take you to the top of the night owl scene and on your way to building your own Nightclub Empire.

name: Nightboarder
summary: You're on a ship alone, fighting an enemy that out guns and out numbers you.

name: Nicktoons Unite!
summary: For the first time ever, a true collaboration of popular Nickelodeon heroes and villains come together and cross over into multiple Nickelodeon cartoon environments, interacting with each other and working together to solve puzzles in this ultimate Nick gaming adventure. Playable characters from the most popular Nickelodeon shows include SpongeBob SquarePants, The Fairly OddParents, team Rocket Power, Jimmy Neutron and Tak. Nicktoons also marks the videogame debut of new Nickelodeon properties Danny Phantom and Rugrats All Grown Up.

name: Niffelheim: Bloody Moon
summary: The Bloody Moon DLC features a long night, a red moon and lots and lots of spiders and skeletons. No hens or hares, it’s just you and your dragon - let’s set everything on fire!

name: Nights into Dreams
summary: R-Zone port of Nights into Dreams.

name: Night of the Wererat
summary: A cheesy short horror game where you play as an exterminator on a dark and rainy night. The house has rats within its walls, but what if something more sinister lies deep within the home? Survive and complete your job, or face down the wrath of the wererat!

name: Ninjabun
summary: The village needs you Ninjabun! Answer the Call. Forge your Carrotana. Hack & Slash your way through countless enemies in action rogue-like combat and go for a high score!

name: Nintama Rantarou Special
summary: Nintama Rantarou Special is an Action game, published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Nith Realms
summary: A free-flow action-adventure game with varied realms to travel through. The player will have to defeat powerful bosses and take on dangerous environments in order to obtain the all-powerful elements to take back the Nith.

name: Ninja Fishing
summary: Ninja Fishing is a fishing game, developed by Gamenauts and Menara Games. It includes 4 stages: Cast your line, Catch fish, Slice fish and Buy upgrades. The player can customize the katana blade, as the upgraded katanas have more slicing power and one exclusive blade can even slash through dynamite.

name: Night Striker
summary: Sega CD/Mega CD Port of "Night Striker".

name: Nights: Journey of Dreams
summary: This time around, however, Nights takes a bit of a different turn. Keeping in line with the "world of dreams" theme – it wouldn't be Nights without it – players will take control of Will and Helen, two young children each entering into Nightopia (the world of dreams) with their own back-story, emotional baggage, and inner demons that come to life though the forming of nightmares. It's a pretty simple concept overall, and with each child's five main levels you'll get a different piece of the story leading up to the same grand finale. Once they arrive in the land of dreams, each character meets up with a Nights almost instantaneously, and from there learns to meld with the mysterious creature and fly through the world of Nightopia. Along the way you'll learn of the quest to find the hidden Ideya (basically essences of the human spirit), and eventually attempt to defeat a powerful god-like creature named Wizeman and his right-hand man Reala.

name: Ninja Chicken 3: The World's Hardest Game
summary:
Ninja Chicken is back with a vengeance! Ninja Chicken 1 is a puzzle game, 2 is a shooting game, in 3, you run like hell!

New Ninja Chicken is a action-packed game where you control two brave young Ninja Chickens that want to defeat the Samurai Pig and retrieve their stolen National treasures.

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Parachute
summary: A keychain port of Game & Watch Parachute.

name: Nightclub Manager Simulator
summary: Create your own nightclub! Serve drinks, keep it clean, sell illegal goods, decorate your club and much more!

name: Ninja Boy
summary: Ninja Boy is an Action game, developed and published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 1990

name: Ninjamurai
summary: Overcome your enemies in this action title in which you play as young Takezou Nishimura, also known as Ninjamurai. He is the offspring of a female ninja and a male samurai.

name: Ninku
summary: Ninku is a PlayStation game based on the manga of the same name. It consists of anime cutscenes interspersed with one-on-one turn-based battles.

name: Night of Wolves
summary: Take on an outbreak of lycanthropy in this medieval 2D “souls-like”! Master an intuitive but demanding combat system, meet enigmatic characters, defeat terrifying bosses and unravel an original plot of revenge and fear. Will you eradicate the plague or succumb to lycanthropy?

name: Ninjatown: Trees of Doom!
summary: Ninjatown: Trees of Doom is the sequel to 2008's strategy DS game. Climb, flip, fling, and fly up the Trees of Doom as you try to make it higher than any other Wee Ninja in Ninjatown.

name: Nimbatus: Drone Creator
summary: Use the Nimbatus Drone Creator to construct physically simulated drones and try them out in a virtual testing environment. Do you have what it takes to become a drone engineer?

name: Nippon Pro Mahjong: Renmei Kounin Motto 20-bai! Mahjgong ga Tsuyoku naru Houhou - Hatsu Chuukyuu-sha-hen
Nightfall Hacker
summary: Nightfall Hacker is a strategy game in which you fight to gain control of nodes from out of control enemies.

name: Night Shift Dissonance
summary: Identify Clients, find out what they want, and deliver items in a timely manner. If you make it to the end of the week you won't live to see another day of work!

name: Ninja Meow Cat
summary: Ninja Meow Cat is a retro-styled 2D action-platformer, inspired by awesome classics of the 8 / 16 bit era; Ninja Gaiden, Castlevania, and Mega Man. Fight your way through 6 levels with hidden treasures to find!

name: Nippon Ecchi Jigsaw
summary: Ecchi jigsaw game. Solve over 10 different mature ecchi style nude images and enjoy.

name: NightFeed
summary: Play alone or invite up to 4 friends in this co-op online action rogue survival. A coven of Shadow Hunters perform a nightly feed across the moors, consuming the dead and acquiring their relics. Collecting to provide an even stronger protection against the darkness during the next NightFeed!

name: Nightlife: Vista
summary: Build your own nightlife empire! Build your venue, decorate it with care, attract talented DJs and boost your popularity with special events. Compete with competitors, solve crises, interact on social media. Make fast and strategic decisions to develop your club and become the ruler of nightlife!

name: Nirvana
summary: Nirvana is a "Multi Action Loglike" game that compares the characteristics of the loglike genre to the doctrine of Tibetan Buddhism's reincarnation. Go on an adventure to protect the world by becoming twins Padma and Pema, who shared the power of God that should lead to one for generations!

name: Ninja Thea
summary: Casual 2D platformer with a cute ninja girl theme.

name: Nix: Ashes of the Phoenix
summary: Ashes of the Phoenix is a survivor style, Roguelite ARPG experience set in a dark high fantasy world. The story follows Nix, a mysterious heroine (or is she?), as she battles her way through hordes of enemies to uncover the mystery that is the world around her.

name: Nishijin Pachinko Monogatari
summary: Nishijin Pachinko Monogatari is a Miscellaneous game, published by KSS, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Ninja Girl: RPG
summary: Action, Adventure, Weapon Throwing RPG, set in a mystical ancient land & brought to life with anime inspired hilariously-awful hand-drawn art! Are you a skillful gamer, with a fast mind and reflexes? Rage-quitting is not in your vocabulary? Think you got what it takes to beat one of the hardest skill-based games on mobiles, ever?! Put your abilities to the test in this deceptively difficult game!

name: Nine Lives
summary: To earn its nine lives a cat must survive the nine trials by solving increasingly intricate puzzles, that might require it to die a few times.

name: Night and Day
summary: Night and Day is a BL dating sim Visual Novel about art, coming of age and jazz music.

name: Night Shift
summary: Night shift is a game built in a new YN-style engine that's entirely web based, developed as part of Dream Diary Jam 2. You explore the dreams of the protagonist Pry, who is travelling in space.

name: Night of the Dead: White Collar Civilian Pack
summary: This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors. It's a neat suit, fit for a gentle survivor.

name: Night at the Grindhouse
summary: In a world that wouldn’t allow them to survive, an entire cast of clichéd combatants meet one fateful night and unleash bloody carnage on their equally-contrived counterparts in this year’s smash hit, The Showdown Effect. Filmed in special 2.5D RenderVisionScope, The Showdown Effect’s multiplayer mayhem blasts its way from the silver screen to your home computer.   Finishing off this unique double feature is one of the most sadistic, diabolical, sinister tales ever told. Three heroic adventurers , in search of fame and fortune, travel to a mysterious theme park overseer – the mythical Dungeon Maestro. Join forces with two of your doomed friends and attempt to take down the treacherous Maestro. Or play the role of the Maestro himself and terrorize the hapless human-controlled heroes. You can’t escape the shock, the terror, the pure insanity of...Dungeonland.

name: Nikka: Rise
summary: Climbing from the bottom to the top is the pursuit of most people. Use your ability to prove that you are the strongest.

name: Ni no Kuni: Hotroit Stories
summary:
Hotroit Stories is an episodic role-playing video game. A prequel to Dominion of the Dark Djinn and Wrath of the White Witch, Hotroit Stories follows Oliver and his friend Mark, who create a custom car by finding parts around the town of Hotroit eventually making their way to an abandoned factory in their search. They are accompanied by a cat. Throughout their search, Oliver and Mark encounter creatures similar to the imajinn/familiars of the main game, which they must fight to proceed. Unlike the main games, Hotroit Stories does not feature magic; characters instead attack using items such as dry ice for similar effects. Anne Lee of Chic Pixel noted that the game features a similar art style to EarthBound (1994).

The game was first teased at a press conference in June 2010, as well as at the Tokyo Game Show in September 2010, before its formal reveal at the Level-5 Vision conference in October 2010. The first chapter, titled "Oliver and Mark", was released in December 2010. Since its release, there has been no news regarding the development or release of subsequent chapters.

name: Ninja Hagakure
summary: Ninja Hagakure is a ninja survival game. Defeat the ever-increasing number of enemies with a variety of ninja techniques to suit the situation.

name: Ninjaman
summary: Ninjaman is an 8-bit platformer street brand game where you throw love at zombies to turn them into homies and no one ever really gets hurt or dies. Because there is a Ninja With A Gold Chain. Are you the one? Can you help Ninjaman save Atlantokyo and throw the best party ever?!

name: Nikoli no Puzzle V: Masyu
summary:
All 50 questions recorded are handmade by Nikoli's puzzle writer, so the feeling of solving is different!
In addition, the operation unique to PlayStationVita makes it easier to play with problems with large board sizes!
From beginners to advanced players, please enjoy the deep world of puzzles.

name: Ninja Tag
summary: Ninja Tag is a 4-player, local multiplayer deathmatch game with stealth elements.

name: Nightclub Emporium
summary: Start your own enterprising odyssey and turn night into day as the boss of your very own Nightclub Emporium!

name: Nimian Legends: Vandgels
summary: It is the eve of a grand debate on the spiritual future of Tiviscus and its people. A meeting of great minds and greater wills will decide the fate of a nation, and perhaps change the direction of Tiviscus itself

name: Niko Niko Pun
summary: Jajamaru, Pikkoro and Porori one day arrive on an island where they find a cute little pink dragon. The poor thing is starving and they all decide to help him and escort the animal through several stages to collect his favorite food (displayed at the bottom of the screen).

name: Ninja Goemon and Immortal Jewels
summary:
Goemon,originally the Iga ninja, and his fellow, Chutaro, the master rat, helped a certain woman on one day and got a red jewel.
.. Goemon is going to sell this precious jewel which is told to bring luck,
but people chasing a jewel an outcome ... they are rolled up in the plot.

name: Nightmare of Santa Claus
summary: Nightmare of Santa Claus is a platformer for Gamate.

name: Ninja Runner
summary:
You think you are the best ninja in history?
well, You have to prove it!
It’s time for a test and show everyone what you're capable of! You’ll have to fly over between building rooftops. Well, Let's test out how much you can handle the speed.
Press and hold for longer jump!

name: Nightscape City
summary: Nightscape City is nightclub management simulation. Manage your nightclub, buy new music, unlock new drinks, grow your empire!

name: Nirvana: The First Travel
summary: Nirvana: The First Travel is a first-person puzzle game, with dialogue driven story, and requires a lot of thinking outside the box.

name: Ninja Hero Cats
summary: Join the Ninja Hero Cats in their brave battle against fish monsters from another dimension. Use your parkour skills to dash over floating islands and collapsing bridges while slicing evil jellyfish and sharks with your sharp blade.

name: Night Gunner
summary: Night Gunner is a shoot'em up set in World War II for the Sinclair ZX81.

name: Nise no Chigiri Omoide no Saki He
summary: Fandisc of Nise no Chigiri.

name: Niki in the Ship
summary: A first-person exploration game set on a planet where a god keeps you in prison. As Niki, you will travel around the planet with your ship, visiting beautiful places and trying to find a way to face the god itself.

name: Ninjas in the Dungeon
summary: Dungeon attack! In this roguelite shooter game, ninjas fight their way through dungeons and defeat various monsters in order to protect the villagers.

name: Nightmare: The Origins
summary: A horror and exploration game, investigate to find out the truth about your presence in these places. You are alone now and no one will hear you scream. Explore, find clues and escape your group must try to successfully discover the source of the evil

name: Night of Disturbance
summary: This game is a short Horror experience, which you as the player will explore and travel through the linear story. This game will challenge you to face your fears and travel through creepy corridors and dark forests. Will you find the secrets lurking in the darkness?

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Oil Panic
summary: A keychain port of Game & Watch: Oil Panic.

name: NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139...: Lunar Tear Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139...
- "Lunar Tear" Collector’s Box
- Steelbook Case
- Grimoire Pin Set
- NieR Soundtrack CD Set x 2

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Mario's Cement Factory
summary: A keychain port of Game & Watch Mario's Cement Factory.

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Soccer
summary: A Nintendo Mini Classics original game of soccer.

name: Ninja Torappu
summary: An indie platformer where you play as a ninja and work your way down an endless, randomly generating tower, seeing how far you can get while dodging traps & enemies.

name: Nights: Moonlight Dreams...
summary: Nights: Moonlight Dreams... is a fan game of Nights into Dreams, developed by Marco Medina.

name: Nightmare Gallery
summary: Centipede clone.

name: Nightmare Trip
summary: Free vertical-scrolling shooting game inspired by the CAVE games and the Touhou series, featuring 3 preset character teams which are all available from the start, as well as the "Dream Power" system, which affects scoring and acts as a useful survival tool.

name: Nitrobike
summary: Ubisoft introduces Nitrobike, the only game on the Wii home video game system from Nintendo that lets you feel the reckless intensity of racing a nitro-charged dirt bike. Developed by Left Field Productions - makers of the Nintendo 64 classic Excitebike 64 - Nitrobike will bring motocross racing to the Wii for the very first time. Give yourself a nitrous boost to rocket past your opponents toward the finish line.

name: Nicole's Risky Job
summary: A parody of The Amazing World Of Gumball, featuring Nicole Watterson starting an online erotic stream. Play as her and manage the stream to secure the money $$$

name: Night World
summary: You are Lee Lance the explorer. Find your way through the many vaults of this cavernous underworld collecting the objects that will lead to the final escape route and the magical golden fleece.

name: Ninja Jump
summary: Jump from roof to roof, look at the scale, the higher the scale at the moment you touch the screen, the higher and further the jump!

name: Nightshade Mysteries: Eternal Moon
summary: In 1930s Southern Europe, dauntless archaeologist Helena Nightshade gets entangled in the mysteries surrounding an ominous eternal lunar eclipse, prophesied by estranged Moon Worshippers also known as the Anaxagori.

name: Ninja Hop
summary: Dynamic action platformer with a set of levels. You play for the ninjia whose purpose to reach top and to get out of a vertical labyrinth.

name: Nikoli no Puzzle V: Heyawake
summary:
All 50 questions recorded are handmade by Nikoli's puzzle writer, so the feeling of solving is different!
In addition, the operation unique to PlayStation®Vita makes it easier to play problems with large board sizes!
From beginners to advanced players, please enjoy the deep world of puzzles.

name: Nickelodeon Rugrats
summary: Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, Lil and Angelica are going to the Carnival to see Reptari. Grandpa, Stu and Drew are in charge of the babies, which means only one thing - delightful chaos, Rugrats style!

name: Nihongo Heroes
summary: Learn Japanese language in a fun way! Smart learning system that teach vocabularies with Japanese alphabet: Hiragana, Katakana and Kanji.

name: Nini Ninja's Great Escape
summary: In this big world a tiny hero comes to save the day, Help Nini Ninja escape the clutches of evil by platforming your way through numerous traps, obstacle and monsters, all while trying to collect the keys to escape the room before the clock runs out, on this modern take on retro platformers.

name: Niwatori ni Natta Ore: Kodoku na Majou to no Itsuka-kan
Ninety Days
summary: Ninety Days is a Tower Defense game where the player defends his tower, improving it from the amount of gold coins earned, building defense and attack upgrades to hold back waves of enemies, archers, swordsmen, giants, catapults and evil ravens for 90 days.

name: Nightmare: The Origins - Curse of Night
summary: A single-player story, dive into the paranormal

name: Nikoli no Puzzle 4: Shikaku ni Kire
Niffelheim: Odin's Blessing
summary: This DLC has been created especially for all those who would like to play Niffelheim in a more relaxed mode. As you can tell from the title, Odin’s blessing will be with you at all times!

name: Ninpen Manmaru
summary: Help Ninja Penquin Manmaru out on a danger filled training quest to receive golden origami paper

name: Nitro Nation VR
summary: Nitro Nation VR is an immersive virtual reality drag racing live game experience for car enthusiasts and newcomers alike. Compete, feel the torque, interact with cars in a new way, customize your garage, vehicles, and celebrate car culture!

name: Night Blights
summary: It's 11pm. Your parents are asleep and Teddy is guarding the end of the bed. Something's moving in the darkness. The wardrobe is creaking and there's laughter behind the door. Night Blights, cruel and mischievous monsters have invaded your home. Can you survive till morning and protect your family?

name: Ninja Time Pirates
summary: Ninja Time Pirates allows players to fight alongside the likes of George Washington, Cleopatra, and other historical figures in an attempt to stop time traveling aliens from taking over the Earth.

name: Nick Beard: The Fedora of Destiny
summary: The fedora: a mark of a true gentleman...

name: Night of the Dead: Beginner Pack
summary: This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors. It's a cute yellow outfit suitable for beginners.

name: Nikhil Murthy's Syphilisation
summary: Nikhil Murthy's Syphilisation is a post-colonial 4X game where you play a student doing a group report on Gandhi, Churchill and the Raj. It eXplores space left uncharted by the genre and so proposes alternatives to established systems.

name: Ninja Gaiden
summary: Ninja Gaiden for Sega Master System was released in 1992 by SEGA. It is a different game from homonym NES game.

name: Night Darkness
summary: You have to take control of one of the most famous mercenaries and complete a special mission to save humanity from certain death.

name: Night & Day
summary: The personifications of Night and Day learn to get along. Discover each other’s unique skills to help both Night & Day come to realize that new paths will open up if they work together.

name: Nihmory
summary: Nihmory: is a single player, action-adventure game that follows Eiya as she uncovers the mysteries of the world of Nihmory. Taking place in an era hundred of years after the fall of technology, Eiya must regain their lost history in order to help - or destroy - all of Nihmory as they know it.

name: Ninja Akio
summary: Ninja Akio is a third person stealth game. Become a Ninja. Complete various missions, from assassinations to rescues. Before heading off on a mission you can select the gear you will take. Be as stealthy as possible to get a high ranking on each mission and unlock new gear.

name: Night Shift
summary: Night Shift is a unique action game where the hero is a worker in a factory owned by Industrial Might and Logic (a parody of Industrial Light and Magic). Your character ensures that the factory is working properly as it cranks out Star Wars action figures, including those of stormtroopers and Darth Vader. The object of the game is to always ensure the factory is working properly, and to move in an increasingly better home.

name: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 Plus
summary: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 Plus is a port of Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2. Its exclusive features are Ninja Race and Tag Missions.

name: Ninja Ryuukenden III: Yomi no Hakobune
summary: The original Japanese version of Ninja Gaiden III. When the game was ported to North America, the game was made harder on purpose with the removal of the password feature and with a boost of damage inflicted by the enemies.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2: Iroh Brawl Pack
summary: Iroh from Avatar: The Last Airbender joins Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2!

name: Ninja Online
summary: A mobile game focused on battling Ninjas. Also known as Hello Bro on Android devices.

name: Ninku
summary: Ninku is a fighting game with adventure elements, for the Game Boy. It is based on the manga of the same name.

name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
summary: Immerse yourself in action-acked Ninja adventure as you help Ryu through his greatest challenge. Battle the hideous ancient forces of darkness to save mankind, with the epic adventure unfolding as you complete each level.

name: Night Stalkers
summary: Be the monster in Night Stalkers. A third person indie game where you choose one of 4 monsters to terrorize a village by hunting the locals. Over the course of your destruction you draw the attention of guards, heroes, and monster hunters to challenge you.

name: Nickelodeon: All-Star Brawl 2 - Rocksteady Brawl Pack
summary: Equipped with his awesome arsenal, Rocksteady from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles joins Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2!

name: Night Escaper
summary: Survive until dawn !Night Escaper is a Rogue-like game which has 20 stages. Choose artifact, strengthen artifact, and acquire skills to destroy enemies. Survive at every stage with luck and skill.

name: Nine To Five (am)
summary:
You know what’s worse than death? Working minimum wage.

A silly game about the horrors of working as a convenience store clerk.

The Boss wants YOU to cover your friend’s shift for a week. Help the customer with everything they need, or not! We don’t really care! Chatting with clients may be nice though.

name: Nice de Shot: World Course Selections
summary: Nice de Shot is a Sports game, developed by Magical Company (Mahou) and published by ASK, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: The Smurfs
summary: A Nintendo Mini Classics original game based on The Smurfs.

name: Nightfall
summary: A Mac-only real time 3D first-person adventure game set in Egypt.

name: Ninja Run!
summary: If you've ever played Flappy Bird, consider it back with a major upgrade! Only this time with increasing difficulty, enemies, more types of movement, a shop to purchase characters from, and plenty more things to come...

name: Nitronic Rush
summary: Nitronic Rush is an experimental survival driving game developed by students at DigiPen Institute of Technology. Using the car’s many abilities (including boost, wings, and jump), avoid obstacles that the city throws at you. In many ways the game is a tribute to racing games of the 1990′s, but with fresh graphics, audio, and gameplay.

name: Nightmare Creatures II
summary:
"Assume the role of Herbert Wallace, an escaped test subject, on the trail of the demonic scientist, Dr. Adam Crowley. After enduring years of horrific lab experiments, Wallace is out to settle the score in a chilling and bloody chase through London and Paris.

Little does he know that exacting revenge on Crowley is also the last hope to save the world from a nightmarish demise."

name: Ninja Flip
summary: Leap into the air — where every flip is a fight for survival and every jump writes your legend.

name: Nioh: Complete Edition - First-Press Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Nioh: Complete Edition
- Nioh: Complete Edition Booklet
- Nioh: Complete Edition Original Mini Soundtrack CD

name: Nihongo School
summary: Let's have fun learning Japanese words with matching games!

name: Ninja Chop!!
summary: Xbox Live QTE indie game.

name: Ninehouse
summary: This game combines "beautiful girls with item pickup and Galgame". You will analyze a variety of beauties in an other world, and find the weaknesses of their personalities by fighting and talking, which will help you understand the deepest desire of your girlfriends and girls you're pursuing.

name: Ninja Dojo
summary: Use your Ninja Skills to Dodge and Survive!!

name: Nightmare
summary: Nightmare is a dystopian FPS where you take control of a Machinangel to incinerate hordes of synthetic demons. Leverage the power of time control, nuclear fission and demonic seals to ascend to digital heaven.

name: Ninja clowns
summary:
Ninja Clowns is a typical beat-em-up developed by Strata, the same company that developed Time Killers and shorta Sequel Bloodstorm. The basis of the games came from BloodStorm and Time Killer.

Game PlayEdit
Players control two clowns who fight against a variety of enemy circus performers. Use martial arts techniques as well as spring-launched boxing gloves, bottles of seltzer and cream pies to defeat your foes and the main boss of the game the evil clown boss Twisto. There are bonus stage in witch the player is placed in a laboratory full of colored flasks and you have to broke them all before the time is up.

name: Nineteen
summary: Nineteen is a 3D action game inspired by the COVID-19 pandemic, where players will explore the body of a young man as a vaccine and help him return to his normal everyday life.

name: Ninpek
summary:
It's Ninja time! Run and jump to reach the end of the world.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Night Flyer: A Bat's Journey
summary: Try to survive as your world disappears.

name: Night Crisis
summary: Night Crisis is based upon a multiplayer co-op experience. The game will focus on a linear PvE-experience, There will be multiple factions of enemies to take down, which may have units on the ground, in the air and on sea.

name: Nikoli no Puzzle V: Yajilin
summary:
All 50 questions recorded are handmade by Nikoli's puzzle writer, so the feeling of solving is different!
In addition, the operation unique to PlayStation®Vita makes it easier to play with problems with large board sizes! From beginners to advanced players, please enjoy the deep world of puzzles.

name: Nice On
summary: Nice On is a golfing game, developed by Aisystem Tokyo and published by Sammy Studios, which was released in Japan in 1999 for the Bandai WonderSwan.

name: Ninja Leagues: Masters of The Mystic Arts
summary: Two teams of elite ninja face off in the arena to secure the legendary Power Scroll. They must smash through the opposing teams defenses to reach the scoring gate. That's all easier said than done when everyone uses their full arsenal of deadly Ninja Arts and weapons to come out ahead.

name: Nijuu Yuumu
summary:
Nijuu Yuumu is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game has a total of 15 effects to collect and no ending. Generally, the game's imagery sticks to a naive and simple style, which usually portrays the world seen by a child.

The game features a young girl known as Kizutsuki and her other personality, Kitsutsuki. Some effects can only be used by a certain personality or differ depending on which personality you use.

The money system in this game is different from most fangames, as you can receive money only by finding it. Nijuu Yumuu also doesn't have any vending machines, instead, you can spend your money by buying plant pots in a flower shop.

name: NieR:Cogito
summary: This game is a non-commercial work, produced for the Nier:Re[in]carnation Content Creator Competition hosted by Square Enix on August 2021. It's an unofficial derivative game made in just 3 weeks about monsters and machines who think they are humans.

name: Nitrogen Narcosis
summary: Nitrogen Narcosis is a thalassophobes deep diving nightmare, set in sinking and sunk abandoned facilities. You and up to 7 other employees wearing the cheapest deep-dive suit money can buy are sent in to recover old materials from these facilities and return it to your captains submarine!

name: Ningyo no Rakuin
summary: Ningyo no Rakuin is a tactical horror RPG inspired by the works of Howard Phillips Lovecraft. Between the fanatical quasi-human tribesmen, the Deep Ones rising from beneath the waves, and the grad student from Miskatonic University, there are more references to the Mythos than you can shake a shoggoth at. The plot itself is fast-paced, centering first on surviving the dangers of the island and later on rescuing the main character's girlfriend from a particularly nasty fate involving an unnamed Elder God and a transformation into a fishy abomination. Elements of the storyline play out before and after (and sometimes during) each battle, and the interludes between battle chapters include a short summary of recent events leading up to the current plot point.

name: Nibiru
summary: Nibiru is a harsh adventure on an uncharted planet that full of danger and trials. In the big and open world you ought to get resources for survival and explore locations in search of salvation along with other players. Left alive, you must find out the reason of the radio silence and, of course, survive.

name: Nightmares from the Deep: Cursed Heart - Collector's Edition
Nightfall Mysteries: Haunted by the Past - Collector's Edition
Nightmares from the Deep: Davy Jones - Collector's Edition
Nightmares from the Deep: The Siren’s Call - Collector’s Edition
Nimban Legacy
summary: Top down Action RPG developed by Software By Your Mom.

name: Ninja Shodown
summary: It’s every ninja for themselves in the ultimate battle for the Jade Katana! Fight alone, team up or take on friends in brutal arena-based combat where the mighty prevail and the weak pay the ultimate price: death and dishonour!

name: Nightfall Mysteries: Black Heart - Collector’s Edition
Nitro Family
summary: "Enjoy gore, brutal action and cool original gameplay like a dual-hand weapon system and high-flying midair combos."

name: Night Light
summary: Defend against the creatures of that night! Protect yourself and your lamp by building and upgrading your base. Equip yourself with the best weapons to deal with the incoming waves.

name: Nicktoons: Attack of the Toybots
summary: The GBA version of Attack of the Toybots is a 2D platformer with light shooter and puzzle elements.

name: NitroRage
summary: NitroRage - crazy multiplayer races with weapons. Destroy your competitors using the minigun, rocket launcher, flamethrower and other guns, or abuse of the machine with a RAM-style Derby. Drive using nitro boosts, jump with springboard on the roofs of buildings, and the demolition of funiture stores and offices, find on the map new weapons. Waiting for you the most destructible environments, lots of fun, explosions and drive and nice graphics on top game engine Unreal engine 4.

name: Ninja Run
summary: Run jump slide and battle your way to a high score in Ninja Run by CooperAce Productions

name: Nightmares of the death
summary: Nightmares of the death it's a psychological horror game in which you will be exploring an unknown place as client 101 while learning the truth of why you are in this place collecting the memories of who you used to be.

name: Night Poetry
summary: Night Poetry is a rogue-lite, story-driven, RPG game, where your choices matter! Survive in your own manner and witness the game's response to your actions, whether it's fighting your way out or coming up with something to bewilder your enemies, as you explore this mysterious world...

name: Nixxsz Castle
summary: Nixxsz Castle is a classic 2D platformer. Inspired by the gold standard of action games from previous generations, Nixxsz Castle brings a new adventure with modern gameplay

name: Night Bars
summary:
Match the falling bars from the top with the bars at the bottom as they keep falling in various speeds and numbers.
Test your tap-eye coordination and leave your mark in the game leader-boards

name: Ninja-kun: Majou no Bouken
summary: An action platformer, the first game of the Ninja-kun series.

name: Nintama Rantarou 2
summary: Nintama Rantarou 2 is an Action game, published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 1996. It also had a view-limited Downloadable game release for the Satellaview that was broadcast in at least 2 runs between March 29, 1998 and November 28, 1998.

name: NightSong
summary: Tycho's Apocalypse. The game depicts a pilgrimage to Victory, the Capitol City of Lights.

name: Nightmare in the Dark
summary:
There lived one gravedigger at a very small village in a remote region. He lived a quiet, solitary life in a corner of the cemetery. He kept away from the village people due to his very ugly appearance. One day, he found the graves were ransacked and some corpses were stolen. He didn't want the village people to find out, so he decided to eliminate the grave burglars by himself. Thus, he patrolled the cemetery every night.

A good ghoul goes around graveyards protecting them from evil doers. The player clears the area and collecting power ups using it to eliminate the enemies. There are five stages with five levels each, and each one of them has you throwing fireballs at ghouls, ghosts, goblins, and zombies. When you keep throwing fireballs at these enemies, they will ignite into a giant fireball, which you can throw at other enemies to kill them, and get the remaining treasure before moving on to the next level. At the end of the fifth level, a boss must be defeated in order to continue the game.

name: Night Witch: 588
summary: Join the legendary female aviators that struck fear into the hearts of Nazis in this plane-stealth game.

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
summary: A Nintendo Mini Classics original based on the Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire movie.

name: Nimbit Frontier
summary: Embark on daring adventures into wild biomes to uncover fragments of long-lost creatures. Bring them back to life by hatching their young. Build them habitats, and release them into the wild. Become the star Nimbiteer you dream of surrounded by lovely folks in a small cozy town.

name: Nissan Presents: Over Drivin' Skyline Memorial
summary:
Nissan Presents: Over Drivin' Skyline Memorial is a localised retail release of Road & Track Presents: The Need for Speed made available in Japan on October 2, 1997.

It was made available for PlayStation as a boxed retail game, and is a re-release of a 1996 localisation aimed for the Japanese market - Road & Track Presents: Over Drivin' DX, but features region orientated content following the 1996 Sega Saturn release - Nissan Presents: Over Drivin' GT-R.

The original car list is substituted with various generations of Nissan Skyline models, and a Japanese language option has been added.

name: Ninja Commando
summary: Players take control of a ninja and must guide him safely through various side-scrolling levels, jumping over pits, dodging obstacles and defeating other ninjas. In every stage, there are numerous doors that constantly spawn new attackers, although there are never more than four enemy ninjas onscreen at the same time. At first, the player's ninja can only defeat his enemies by jumping on them. Defeating three enemies in a row gives access to additional ranged weapons: shuriken, bombs, a flamethrower and a rifle. Apart from other ninjas there are also indestructible, moving obstacles and other enemies including golems, worms and birds.

name: Nishimura Kyoutarou Travel Mystery: Akugyaku no Kisetsu
summary: A travel mystery adventure game based on and supervised by Japanese mystery writer Kyotaro Nishimura.

name: Night Watch Racing
summary: Night Watch Racing is a racing game for the PC.

name: Nightmare Rooms VR
summary: How did you end up here exactly? There's something familiar about this whole place, as if you've been here in your dreams... or nightmares! So many empty rooms... You must be the only one down here, right?

name: Nichiyoubi ni Uchuujin ga…?
summary: A text-based adventure game developed by Soft Studio Wing released only in Japan.

name: Night Forest
summary: The game gonna put you face to face with lots of dangers on the way to save your friend. Saws, lasers, turtles and lots of other things gonna make you enraged and break down your monitor screen.

name: Night Walk
summary: Night Walk is an action platformer taking place in a cemetery at night

name: Nitemare
summary: This map takes place in some kind of huge and complex castle with it's own sewer system

name: Night of the Assassins
summary: Night of the Assassins - you will find yourself in the role of a mysterious killer, able to manipulate the shadow and hide in it in order to approach your enemies unnoticed. Your character is a master of stealth and the art of assassination, who is legendary.

name: Nitroglycerin
summary: Nitroglycerin picks up where Quantum Physics left off. Duke exits the EDF Base by riding an elevator back to street level. In the North of the once popular holiday destination of Seaside city the industrial zone is dark and mostly disused. The EDF have learned that the alien invasion stems from a ship that was crash landed near the old city hall, these aliens weren't meant to invade, they were merely a scouting party, but when they crashed they deployed troops to find parts to repair their ship. The problem is that if the scouting party fix that ship, there are bound to be other aliens waiting to hear from them and if they hear Duke Nukem is around, they will probably all descend on the planet and cause a war.

name: Ninja Duck
summary: Press space to dodge the ninja stars.

name: Ninja Girl and the Mysterious Army of Urban Legend Monsters! ~Hunt of the Headless Horseman~
summary: In a world where monsters thrive and wraiths run wild, and ghouls and ghosts roam the streets, there exist those who hunt the creatures that do humans harm.

name: Night Flight
summary: Japanese Tomy Pyuuta title, part number 007E, released in 1982.

name: Night at the Office
summary: A single player mod set in a high-rise office building. Terrorists are taking over the building and working their way up to your location, you then begin a desperate race to save the other employees and stop the terrorists before its too late!

name: Nitori Dungeon
summary:
How far can you conquer? This is a 2D action game.
This game is a derivative work of Touhou Project.

name: Nitrome Must Die
summary: A Nitrome Game. Blast your way through Nitrome Towers in an action packed two player shooter!

name: Nickelodeon Kart Racers Collection
summary:
Nickelodeon Kart Racers Collection is a Nickelodeon crossover video game box set released for the Nintendo Switch

3 Games include
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway

name: Nightflite
summary: Full flight simulation was offered in this innovative early release. Landing at night (so as to keep the graphics simple and the running speed high on a 3.54Mhz system), you must take off, climb, control the plane mid air, and then land successfully. As well as basic steering, rudders, flaps, wheels and airspeed come under your control. There are five different flight challenges featured, including navigation as well as flight skills, plus a rolling demo on startup.

name: Ninja Pug
summary: Try to have the better score between your friends, become the best ninja on the island and save all the pugs!

name: Ninja Golf 2
summary: A Golf game, Vampire Survivors like, with lot of Shmup inside

name: Nightmare Slash
summary: "Nightmare Slash" is a 2D slasher with a side view. The player uses mouse to cut his enemies, to dodge and run from flying creatures, wait for the moment to kill dark enemies who gets in his way.

name: Ninjabread Man: Blades of Fury
summary: An unreleased sequel to Ninjabread Man, which got cancelled following after Data Design Interactive got shut down.

name: Nishijin Pachinko 3
summary: Nishijin Pachinko 3 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Soft Machine and published by KSS, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Nihonkai Daikaisen
summary: Naval battle simulation for MSX.

name: Nicki Minaj: The Empire
summary:
Join the Queen of Rap in a dramatic adventure as you rise from humble beginnings to become the next legend of hip-hop!
Drop a verse on Nicki’s new song “Ain’t Gone Do It”!
Write lyrics and record your own raps to share with friends!
Party at penthouses and clubs; chat live with that hot guy or girl who's checking you out!
Dress to impress with the latest fashions and show off your best outfits!
Customize your crib and invite your friends to party all night!

name: Night Raid
summary:
Remake of 1982's Paratrooper.

The player controls a gun turret at the bottom of the screen. The turret can swivel to cover a large area of the screen, but cannot move from its base. Helicopters fly across the screen at varying heights, dropping paratroopers. The gun may fire multiple shots at once, and the shots may destroy helicopters or shoot paratroopers. Paratroopers may be disintegrated by a direct hit, or their parachutes may be shot, in which case they will plummet to earth (splattering and dying, killing any paratrooper onto whom they fall). Periodically, jets may fly by and drop bombs; the jets and bombs may be shot as well.

name: Night Run
summary: A stylized night-time speed-running game

name: Night at the Full Moon Motel
summary: Short horror-thriller game for Game Boy. Play a character in need of cash, who is hired to be night manager at a strange motel. Explore the motel and its surroundings to reveal it's secrets, fulfil guests requests and keep them happy because your life could depend on it.

name: Nikita: Speedy Pirates
summary: Kart racer developed by Techland. Spin-off game featuring characters seen in Nikita: The Mystery of the Hidden Treasure.

name: Ninja Ken
summary: Ninja Ken is a classic platformer game that brings your childhood back. Mind the obstacles, traps on road. Collect the coins and be rewarded with power-up in shop. Kill the enemies as much as you can to achieve high score.

name: Nichibutsu Mahjong Collection
summary: Strip mahjong game featuring FMV scenes and photographs of models.

name: Nightmare Knock
summary: Nightmare knock is a visual novel about a simple man who gets knocked on his window at night. What happens next is up to you, because there are many choices in the game that affect the story and whether you survive the night. 8 possible endings, only one of which you will survive. Nice atmospheric graphics, your own soundtrack, and high-quality sounds will plunge the user into an atmosphere of despair and fear.

name: Nitro Nation World Tour
summary:
Get ready to race across the globe in Nitro Nation World Tour! – an all new car racing and car collection experience made to celebrate car culture. Drive some of the fastest cars in the world in this free to play drag racing game. With officially licensed cars, drag racing will never be the same experience again!
Show off your fleet of exotic cars to your friends, or flaunt your fastest quarter mile with your tuned out ride! Immerse yourself in the complete drag racing experience, with a challenging campaign mode and high-octane PvP gameplay.

name: Nimby Rails
summary: Design and run your own railroads for the real world. Fix global transportation dilemmas. Unleash your inner railway engineer and transit policy manager.

name: Night Star
summary: An arcade vertical-scrolling shoot-'em-up by Data East where the player embarks on numerous flights to assemble a space station (then the Night Star colony, then a "space dock").

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Spider-Man
summary: A handheld game featuring Spider-Man, released as part of Nintendo Mini Classics, a series of small LCD games licensed by Nintendo since 1998.

name: Nightfall Wardens
summary: "Nightfall Wardens", a co-op horror survival game set on a reality TV show. Survive haunted zones, manage your Fear, and win sponsorships for survival boost. Will you entertain and survive, or succumb to the shadows?

name: Niconotes the Whoo!
summary: Help the magical musical NicoNotes fly back into their nests!

name: Nightmare (working title)
summary: In Nightmare (working title) is the game which the Magic Fish Studio is making currently. This is a dark fairytale of exploring the growing pain and self-salvation. Players will wander in mysterious dream world, in other world, it is an adventure game combined with imagination and realism.

name: Night Project
summary: Night Project is the first game to introduce you to the history of corporate Degrees Intertainment. As you progress through the game, you will be able to find notes that will fully describe to you the entire deep history of the largest corporation in this game universe. The main antagonist is not a successful experiment of the Degrees Laboratories companies, called the "Kili project". Your task is not only to search for keys and notes, but also to simultaneously deceive the AI, whose task is to scare you as much as possible.

name: Night of Love
summary: Some things may seem unforgivable at the first, but a long night spent together may change everything and bring back the forgotten feelings...

name: Ninja Chicken Basic
summary: Save the Ninja Chickens from the jaws of doom! With your godly finger, attempt to swoop them to the safety of their correct ninja zones while avoiding the Robot Chickens and getting rid of the evil pigs. Are you Ninja Chicken enough to help?

name: Night Racer
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of Night Racer and reach the finish line before all your opponents.

name: Ninja Sneaking VS
summary: Asymmetrical versus action game. The game is divided into two sides: the intruder side and the pursuer side. The intruder player aims for the goal at the right end of the screen in each stage. The pursuer player sets traps & controls enemy ninjas to prevent players from interfering.

name: Nicolas Eymerich The Inquisitor Book II: The Village
summary: Evil and heresy have invaded Calcarès, but that is without counting on the inquisitor and his uncompromising methods for foiling the fiendish plans threatening the village.

name: Night Vigil
summary: After a biological attack turns most of the people in Chicago to monsters it's up to you and your team of Extraordinaries to save the night!

name: Ninja Frog
summary: A cute and easy platformer game.

name: NightStar
summary: "NightStar" is an independent and fictional work with the dynamic world and the feelings of the homeland.

name: Night Shift: Remade
summary: This is an homage to Puppet Combo's game: Night Shift.

name: Nighthunt
summary: Nighthunt is a multiplayer 3v3 stealth-action horror game where one team must defend their base and protect the radio antenna, while the other team tries to sneak in and steal it.

name: Nightmare Collection: Telephone Call
summary: Telephone Call is a short horror story about receiving strange phone call during a party.

name: Nippon Suugaku Kentei Kyoukai Kounin: Suuken DS - Otona ga Tokenai!? Kodomo no Sansuu
Nice Bowling
summary: Nice Bowling is an unfair bowling game modeled after the late 80's, early 90's obsession with chrome and neon, Nice Bowling's unique look and retrowave/chillwave soundtrack will really bring you back. Random events can trigger on any frame of play to a huge variety of outcomes- good luck bowling with a beach ball, a jelly blob, or a bouncy ball. Sometimes fish rain from the sky and block the lane. Sometimes there will be obstacles or ramps in your path.

name: Ningyou Genkai
summary: Avoid or defeat dolls that move when you're not looking, take their bodies, and make your way to the 399th dimension. This is a short horror game of fear and strategy, an exploration survival horror.

name: Night in Riverager
summary: A Night In Riverager is a free horror short set in the monochrome world of My Beautiful Paper Smile. It tells the tale of a strange hunter in an even stranger land, on a quest to find medicine for his ailing mother. Strange and powerful forces are stirring. Can he resist them?

name: NinjaFT
summary: NinjaFT is a play-to-earn blockchain game on iOS / Android. Build a ninja with NFTs you own and battle to earn crypto and NFTs!

name: Nigepico
summary: The first game released by Gotmail. The player must escape a hair salon after falling asleep.

name: Nightmara
summary: Old school horror with new school technology.

name: Ninja Gaiden 3DS
summary: Ninja Gaiden 3DS is a cancelled installment in the Ninja Gaiden series for the Nintendo 3DS. The game was announced at E3 2010, however was cancelled before release.

name: Night Signal
summary: Congratulations on your state-of-the-art Hinnikers Television set! You are ready to enter the wonderful world of televised programming! One word of warning however - Hinnikers brand televisions do not function properly after midnight.

name: NightClub Simulator
summary: Step into the vibrant world of nightlife! Create, manage, and customize your very own nightclub. From hiring staff and organizing events to setting the perfect atmosphere with music and lighting, every choice you make will shape your club. Are you ready to become the ultimate nightclub tycoon?

name: Nightmares
summary: Nightmares is a couch co-op puzzle game for two players with a spooky atmosphere! Play as Elena the little girl and Duvet the cover.

name: Night Tail
summary: There are monsters in the world that devours human memory and spirit, called dream monster. The protagonist, Yoru, has the power to fight against the dream monsters to dispel people's nightmares. To save everyone, Yoru decided to challenge "Paradise Manager", the manipulator of the dream monsters.

name: Night Wanderings
summary: "Night Wanderings" is a classic 2D arcade shooter game with tons of enemies and settlements you need to defend!

name: Nine Provinces: Caravan
summary: On the ancient nine province continent, you may become a businessman, get to know others, expand caravans, and free trade and exploration.

name: Nico: Ittekimasu no Oheya
summary: A small girl named Nico living in your device - live with a program for a short time in this raising simulation

name: Nikujin
summary: A freeware independent title starring a nudist ninja in a platformer/action game.

name: Nik Super Gunventure
summary: A 2d pixel art rougelike made in GDevelop.

name: Nintama Rantarou 3
summary: Nintama Rantarou 3 is an Action game, published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Nil Admirari no Tenbin: Irodori Nadeshiko
summary: Nil Admirari no Tenbin: Irodori Nadeshiko is a bundle of both Nil Admirari no Tenbin games for the Nintendo Switch.

name: NIV Bible & the 20 Lost Levels of Joshua
Ninja Stealth 4
summary: Ninja Stealth IV is a new challenge for you. Be stealth, evade from lasers, cameras, motion detectors and security guards. Collect all computers to beat the game.

name: Nightway
summary: Nightway is a multiplayer horror game designed for 1-6 players. In this game, one player is randomly selected to be the monster, a creature who is blind but can hear perfectly. The other players take on the role of survivors who must work together to avoid the monster and escape the forest by train.

name: Nios
summary: NIOS is a futuristic anti gravity obstacle racing game arcade where you run along a point to point paths in a open world map. Get your best score overtaking the greatest number of opponents in sequences without hit them. P.S. Remember to follow the green arrow otherwise you could get lost. :-)

name: Nihon-shi Nengou Grid
summary: This game is designed to help players learn to accurately recall the years of Japanese historical events when given their names, by selecting the correct year from a 10x10 grid.

name: Niko and the Cubic Curse
summary: Niko and the Cubic Curse is a hand drawn 2D Platformer created by indie developer Josh Rieg. Play as Niko and help him uncover the mystery of everyone's new shape-like appearances!

name: Night on Doom Mountain
summary: A lengthy and difficult single level for Boom Compatible ports with a slightly otherworldly and halloween-esque theme.

name: Nippon Ichi no Meikantoku
summary: Nippon Ichi no Meikantoku is a baseball management game, where you take control of a team and manage it by controlling the player training and various other aspects of the team. You can watch games being played out and make changes during the match, such as changing the pitcher, outfield player positions and batting order. You start the game by creating your manager and entering your name, then you get a randomized number of attribute points to distribute for four different categories. After that, you choose a team to manage and five other teams to play against.

name: Nightmare Circus
summary: Nightmare Circus is an action-adventure game where the player takes on the role of a Puppeteer trapped in the Nightmare Realm. Set out on a journey to find his friends and escape the nightmare!

name: NinJump Dash
summary: A multiplayer racing game for iOS and Android.

name: Nightmare of May
summary: "Nightmare of May" is an atmospheric horror game set in 1960s Southeast Asia. Combining elements of Southeast Asian and Eastern cultures, the game features witchcraft, religious themes, and unsettling imagery for a truly immersive experience.

name: Ninja Castle Escape
summary: Use your creativity and ninjutsu skills to escape from the booby trapped castle. Your goal is to lead the ninja to a successful escape. Also including a Stage Editor to share castle designs with others in Steam Workshop for endless fun. Ninja Castle Escape starts now!

name: Nix Umbra
summary: Light is my Sword, Darkness shall perish

name: Nightmare
summary: The courier, Lympha, tells her; "If you were to defeat the boss, Malignant Tumor, in this world, you shall return to your own world." Julia strives with an Anticancer Drug held in her arms. Believing that, the flower blooming at the nidus, is glimmering in Nightmare...

name: Nightmare
summary: Nightmare is a single-player survival-horror game. Once in a bad dream, you will have to decide: find a way to wake up or stay in it forever.

name: Ninja JaJaMaru-kun: Onigiri Ninpou-chou
summary: Ninja-themed 3D action game.

name: Ninja Grannies
summary: A fighting game starring elderly characters. Completed but unreleased, although it is available on the internet in "other" forms.

name: Nitro Rally
summary:
"Nitro Rally" is totally inspired by the old classic arcade top racing games of the 80's; great gameplay and perfect cars control system makes the game as the first 100% arcade rally racing game on your iMAC!
You have 20 different tracks to race and you can unlock two more powerful cars hidden; and a lot of other features that you will discover while playing.
The graphic is colorful and detailed, the machines have a very good control system, the sound is really nice, listen the engine of your car and tries to have a good speed to use the turbo when you need an extra boost!

name: Nightmare Game
summary: Stay in a warehouse for 24 days,You can get a $1,000,000 as bonus! Eight people,Think differently. It is not so easy to get a bonus! Through eight different perspectives of roles. Uncover the fog step by step! Finally let you know the truth! "Nightmare Game" is a suspense plot game, rich plot is the characteristics of this game.

name: Nibbler
summary: The object is to navigate a virtual snake through an enclosed maze, while consuming dots along the way. The length of the snake increases with each object consumed, making the game more difficult. The player must also avoid colliding with walls or obstacles, and must also avoid colliding with the snake's own body sections. After all the objects on the screen have been eaten, the player progresses to the next wave, involving harder obstacles and/or higher game speeds.

name: Nightwatch
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Ross Norton as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Nimbatus: The Space Drone Constructor
summary: Nimbatus: The Drone Constructor is an action simulation game. Craft drones out of hundreds of different parts and explore a fully destructible, procedurally generated galaxy!

name: Nintendo Adventure Books 3: Monster Mix-Up
summary:
Nintendo Adventure Books: Monster Mix-Up is a digital version of the gamebook of the same name written by Bill McCoy and published by Archway Paperbacks in 1991.

It was an entry into the openXile Craptastic Coding Competition 2009.

name: Ninja Gaiden
summary:
Ninja Gaiden is an action video game released for the Game Gear in 1991 by Sega with license from Tecmo. It stars Ryu Hayabusa and is part of the Ninja Gaiden series, although it features a plot not connected to any of the other Ninja Gaiden games.

Gameplay is in many ways similar to the NES and Master System games with minor differences in mechanics. Jumping is more like moon jumping and the sword slash is quicker and has a wider range. Ryu can also scale walls and edges. There four different secondary weapons. Ryu's "spiritual strength" (called Force) can go up to 99.

name: Nicktoons: Battle for Volcano Island
summary: Join SpongeBob, Timmy Tuner, and Danny Phantom in an all out battle to stop the evil Mawgu from taking control of Volcano Island!

name: Nimbus
summary: Nimbus is a unique combination of racing & puzzling. The player controls a craft with no means of directly propelling itself and needs to use whatever is scattered around the levels to acquire thrust and reach the goal. Traverse a world map with several distinct islands in order to recover your lost love. Light on story, but heavy on gameplay Nimbus offers several hours of increasingly harder challenges.

name: Ninja Gaiden
summary: A wristwatch port of Tiger's Ninja Gaiden.

name: Nick Reckless in The Curse of the Lost Cause
summary: Enjoy the mystery of old school gameplay in this classic side-scrolling platformer, explore four different environments, make your way through procedurally generated levels for ever-changing play sessions, and ultimately lift the curse of the lost cause.

name: Night Feeder
summary: Night Feeder is a bullet heaven where you play as the monstrosity of the night, destined by your deity. You can summon minions along the way or go alone to face the adventures.

name: Nintendogs + Cats: Shiba Inu & New Friends
summary: One of the versions of Nintendogs + Cats. This version was only released in Japan and China, being replaced by Golden Retriver & New Friends worldwide.

name: Nicola Kanshuu: Model Oshare Audition Platina
summary:
Create your own character and work as an editor for the real Japanese teen fashion magazine "Nicola”. Pick out outfits, take photos, and make it all look perfect for print! Aim to become the best!

The 3DS edition of a larger series. Japan exclusive.

name: Nightfall
summary: Nightfall is a top down sci-fi game with turn based combat. After waking up on a strange world without any recollection of your past, you must explore, fight, and survive in order to rediscover your memories and find out why, and by whom they were taken away.

name: N-Ice Cover
summary: N-Ice Cover is a 3D platformer/puzzle game that lets you play as Icy, a cute little ice cube whose goal is to cool down drinks they find there and there. To reach their objective, they'll have to overtake obstacles by placing their unpossessed body as a platform. Will you get your cocktail on this hot summer day?

name: Night Confessional
summary:
It was several years before the abolition of the papacy that coin-operated confessionals began to populate the cities.

An interactive fiction piece about a confession booth at the end of the year.

name: Night/Shade: You're the Drug
summary: Night/Shade is an 18+ visual novel about overcoming the toxicity within interpersonal relationships as well as within oneself. This character driven plot explores the complexities of love and loss in the form of a romantic thriller through the eyes of our main character, Sasha, while he navigates life's darker elements and tries not to get caught in the crossfire of two ruthless crime syndicates.

name: Ninja-kun: Ashura no Shou
summary: Famicom port of Ninja Kid II.

name: Night Island
summary: Welcome to Night Island. This is a Roguelite overhead action game with a rich set of random levels and a number of powerful Boss, combined with a deep plot selection. Players will collect blank memories in the cycle of constant death on an isolated island that has been shrouded in the night, revealing a secret of horror.

name: Nitro: Stream Racing
summary: Nitro is a high-speed, streamer-led, chat-plays racing game played live on stream! Earn rewards to build out your garage of customizable cars and characters. Climb the leaderboard with your community to earn trophies and qualify for the end-of-season Streamer Grand Prix!

name: Ninja Knight
summary:
